one_review_text: I hesitated to get 24” monitors since I don’t even have that big at my office. But since I’ve had to telework the last month they’ve been amazing!

one_review_title: Mounted 6 of these and they are awreome
one_review_text:
Great monitors, would buy again if I have the need

Key features for me: mounting and headphone jack
Just what I was looking for for my home office set-up while working at home during Covid. The monitor is nice and big and the included HDMI cable works perfectly with my laptop.

I have a 15 inch Apple MacBook Pro that I connected to this monitor. The screen is a plug and go model with 2 hdmi ports. It’s clear and the color, brightness settings can be changed easily on the monitor. I have had it for 6 weeks and my only issue is that the stand is a little wobbly. I plan to mount it on the wall, since it has the 4 screws on the back for a bracket mount. Now and then the screen flickers but it transitions very well from the laptop to the monitor. The HDMI also allows you to use your PC as a 2nd screen, with up to 4 windows open side by side.
I am so glad I bought this screen on sale and right before the Covid-19 stay home order. It has saved my eyes working at home now!

The Monitor developed a line of dead pixels after about two weeks of usage. 

Other than that it actually works well for all I use it for.
Please see attached images of how I have received the product/package. So far this is a very bad experience. This looks like a refurbished item or looks like it was already opened and re-packed.
Horrible picture quality.  Supposed to be 1080p hd and looks like sd. Grainy and pixels showing.  All color and graphics look terrible.

one_review_title: Exactly what I needed for a great price
one_review_text: I got this for $70 off the retail price of $199.99, I was looking for a solution to be able to hook up my laptop and gaming console and pass-through audio to a pair of speakers, my other monitor an Acer, only had DVI and VGA and no audio I tried using an HDMI splitter that separates the audio but I believe due to the monitor not allowing audio and that I was using a DVI to HDMI cable the separated audio was just static. Now I have my laptop and PS4 hooked up and I have a pair of amazon basics speakers for audio and it works great. The monitor is bright and crisp no problems will probably buy a second one down the road and make it a dual monitor setup.

I bought this monitor because i needed a good 2nd monitor. I saw that it was on sale for $109, so i bought it & it was the best purchase i have made in a while! The picture quality is great & there are no flickers. 12/10

I bought this as a second screen for my laptop since we had to suddenly work from home due to the virus. The price is pretty great and the monitor looks great. I haven’t tried it out gaming yet, mostly for work. Very good price though.

one_review_title: Good Value for a second Monitor
one_review_text: Required an additional monitor for my wife to pull close for detail work when necessary. Set this up on 10 Dec so she hasn't worked with it much during the holidays. She likes it so far. This is a second monitor attached to an iMac. The resolution is crisp and the brightest is acceptable. Will have to see in a couple more months if she finds this acceptable on her eyes. I didn't give this the top score because we just haven't worked with it long enough.

one_review_title: My ideal choice for a non-thunderbolt dual monitor
one_review_text:
Not much to say other than it was plug-in-play and performed as advertised!

I especially love the flexibility available with the 2 HDMI and 1 VGA port(s)!

The edges were slim enough to pair both together for a pleasant dual-monitor display!

one_review_title: Great for switching between my PC & Cable TV Feed
one_review_text: I have a Big Screen TV and my PC in a room. Much of the time the TV is tied up with PC gaming with PS4, Nintendo Switch and another PC that uses the TV screen as its monitor. I got this LG monitor because it has 2 HDMI inputs. HDMI Port #1 connects to my PC. I have an HDMI Splitter connected to my cable box with 2 outputs that connect to my TV and HDMI port #2 on the LG. It works Great!!! The monitor has an audio port I currently use for headphones, but can hook to speakers if I want to later. Since the splitter is always feeding the cable box signal, I can switch between PC and Cable TV whenever I want. This filled a definite need I wanted and with a quality solution.

This is my second purchase of this monitor. I bought one when first told I'd be working from home in March.   It worked great in displaying the various apps I use for work.  Last month I got tired of the small print on my laptop screen, and when considering a second monitor went back to this model.  Great price too - not using it for video games but the clarity on Zoom is great.  Easy to setup and integrate with other devices.

The monitor is great for our needs but the Geek Squad agent that came and checked out of other monitor stated he really thought it was the mother board and suggested we would be better off to get another one.  This is the reason for the purchase.  When we got this 24" LG monitor home, out of curiosity, my husband took the new cable from the new 24" monitor and hooked it up to our supposed bad monitor and it worked perfectly fine.  Your tech should have checked this out himself and then furnished us with a new cable and then we wouldn't of had to buy another monitor.  But we have a spare if we need it.

I was looking to get a new monitor and this seemed to fit the “bill” quite nicely.  The price point was excellent!!  Much to my great surprise this monitor’s picture is outstanding!  The black is black and every pixel is super sharp!  Love picture the quality! Also the navigation of the internal settings pretty slick as well!  The only missing thing is a USB port that would have made this a perfect purchase!!

I purchased this monitor for my home office for when I work from home. I have two other LG monitors on my personal desktop (both 29"), and they have been excellent montiors. It renders fine for what I need it to do. I also use it on another desktop, and it works well with that device as well. I recommend this monitor is you are looking for a replacement montior or a seperate monitor for a lapotp.

We purchased four of these over the course of two months, when they where on sale ($129 each). For the price and what they do for our office, they are excellent and I would recommend them. We are not gaming, so I can't comment on that. For general office, watching videos, and quality when watching video conferences they are excellent monitors.

I'd definitely recommend this monitor! I purchased it because my neck was starting to hurt by looking down at my laptop all the time. I was looking for a relatively affordable monitor that I could hook up to my MacBook Pro, and this one fit the bill. I love it, and only have a few cons I'd like to share, just in case it helps someone else while making a purchase: 

1. My eyes are very sensitive to light, and I usually turn my brightness down pretty low. The brightness on the monitor doesn't change when I turn down the brightness on my laptop. Thankfully, I have blue light glasses, so that helps. But it does feel a bit too bright for me at times. 

2. Going from my retina display on my laptop to the display on this monitor was something I had to get used to. The non-retina display means that some things look a little blurry, and lettering isn't as sharp. But hey - better to save my neck than to worry about the sharpness of the display! It's definitely good enough :) 
3. The colors on this monitor show a bit darker and less vibrant than the colors on my laptop. Not a huge deal, since I'm not doing a lot of design work. But if you were - or if you were editing photos or making graphics, I might say go with a monitor that matches color better! 

Once again, I do love the monitor and it has made a huge difference in my neck and back aches! I'd recommend if that's all you need it for!Read more

This is a terrific monitor that I bought for my fourth grader for school. It is Very easy to set up and It is certainly a very reasonable price.  I would add that for the price it seems that the screen resolution is great. Based on the above I would strongly recommend this monitor.

Have been using this monitor almost daily for about a month.  The monitor performance is exactly what I needed.  Color is great and text, even very small text, is crisp and easy to read.  My only caution is that operating instructions are not very clear.  It took a little trial and error to figure out how to access monitor controls.

one_review_title: Need a new monitor this fit's the bill
one_review_text:
Want a monitor to replace your old one this one does the job and the features on this one are not the best but get the job done. 

There is a headphone jack on the back of this monitor two HDMI and a DVI ports for computers that use those and has a cd that you can use for the monitor with your mouse.

but the choice is up to you to get this monitor or not .

one_review_title: Beautiful Picture. Great for work or Gaming.
one_review_text: This monitor is fantastic! I work full time from home and this has enhanced my speed and productivity. The 24'' is prime for multi tasking as I toggle between tasks during the work day.  I noticed such a difference, I purchased a second monitor (the same one) for my assistant.

This is my first ever monitor I bought and it is awesome! My favorite feature is the software that let's you use up to 8 windows on one screen. For me, this was a game changer because I was about to buy another one of these monitors for a second screen for my laptop setup. Thank you again LG for your innovative technology!

Purchased as second monitor in 2-montor setup at vacation home.  Was a quick purchase on sale without much research.  The screen is sufficiently bright and has good color.  However, I wish I had purchased something with a bit more resolution.  Small text is a bit grainy.  For something you are working up close daily, I recommend something with more resolution.  If this is simply a display monitor from a distance greater than 3-feet, it is excellent.

one_review_title: So nice, I bought it twice
one_review_text: Bought two of these on a half off sale for my sons new build. He absolutely loved them, and the 75hz refresh rate is an added plus. The overall build leaves a little to be desired compared to my 144 Asus's, but It was a great deal, and they work great. The color, brightness, and refresh rate are perfect. He loved them, and they should be able to last him a few years.

Nice screen and the sale price was fantastic. Easy to use controls. I have it connected to 2 laptops and it's simple to switch between  them as needed and change  any of the settings. The images and colors are good for a screen at this price point.

Unfortunately I had to return it, not because anything was bad. I was because my desk top is older and is not set up to run 2 monitors.  I was so disappointed. I picked the LG - 24" IPS LED FHD FreeSync Monitor  because I already have one.

I was looking for a IP Monitor that runs at 144 HZ as recommended from a friend. This was for my first every self-built PC and I have absolutely zero regrets. The quality is crisp and monitor is vertically movable to fit your needs. Will recommend to anyone looking for a HD computer screen. 10/10

Price was right for a 24" monitor used in business.   The only criticism I have was they hid the power button and there was no documentation as to it's location.  Took me a few minutes to find and learn how to access the on screen menu. The easy setup guide was useless for this.
This monitor is easy for the eyes. I wasn’t bought to game, but it is used for school and used 6 hrs a day. I have not had any issues and setup was very simple. Color rate seems legit.

I recently purchase this monitor and it’s really great and work perfectly fine. I highly recommend this to everyone who are looking for 24inch monitor along with the good price tag. I would like to confirm that it’s great to work on but only issue which I felt (personally) that Monitor stand is little fussy saying if you type fast on your keyboard you will see your monitor will start shaking. The monitor stand can be made little better or stronger. But as whole it is a great product.

I truly like LG products.  All 3 of my TVs are LGs and so is my phone.  I have a computer with an approximate 15 inch screen.  I wanted a monitor and found the 24 inch LG at Best Buy on sale.  It was a very easy decision to buy it.  I really like the size and the colors on the things I have watched on it are brilliant.

I bought this monitor to serve as a second screen in my work-from-home setup. I only use it for work-related software and the occasional Youtube video, so I can't say how it performs for games.
Installation was pretty much plug-and-play. I didn't have to install additional software or drivers.

This monitor gives me much better resolution than the laptop screen. It also provides greater space to leave programs open. Silly to have an i7 professor and be limited by the laptops own monitor. A good solution.

Great monitor for working and live-streaming in a multiple displays setting.
Works great with a MacBook Pro 2012, and a mini-display port to HDMI adapter.

one_review_title: Great monitor for work with 2 hdmi's
one_review_text: Great monitor with 2 hdmi's. Power adapter with a thin cable is nice, but I don't like the LG software for screen split and other functions. I ended up uninstalling it. Otherwise, the monitor itself is excellent.

This monitor is perfect for my needs. I purchased it once I had to begin working from home as an additional screen so that I wouldn't have to stare at my tiny laptop all day, and it was a great decision. Good value for the price. It is a little wobbly (could be user installation error), but I would recommend it if you are looking for a good screen! 

(I don't use it for gaming - just work, videos, etc.)

one_review_title: Good quality and picture for price!
one_review_text: Got this on sale for 129$, initially ordered an Asus brand and the item was defective. Have owned LG TV product for years and it’s lasted well, and I imagine the same will be the case with this new monitor.
Another great deal from Best Buy. I think LG products are of the best quality on the market. And it had fantastic resolution. Perfectly clear pictures and sharp images.
these monitors are great. they worked as described. they are easy to connect. the image quality is on par with what you would expected. i would recommend for personal or small office usage.
don't settle for 60Hz. This is a good monitor that covers all the basics, compatible with AMD FreeSync, and good color calibration / reproduction
This monitor has worked out great. Actually bought 2 for a split screen setup and I am very pleased. A great value along with great vibrant colors.

one_review_title: I'm guessing since I'm still waiting on delivery
one_review_text:
Ordered July 11.  Shipped July 12 via UPS SurePost.  One week to go from GA to CA, then to HI via USPS Parcel Post.  Parcel Post takes 4 to 8 weeks.

Other orders I made with Best Buy were shipped Priority Mail.  I usually get those in a week.

So... the monitor looks good, at least according to the pictures.  Look at the red glow of the alien eyes.  Wowza!  And the pew pew of its laser gun, RAD!
Excellent color representation and clear screen that has thus far worked great for moderate use. (Movies, streaming, work, games....all of the above here and there)
This is a great Monitor to have. I really enjoyed it for gaming. It really a great deal and you get your value of this item. I would buy again.
Really enjoyed my screen. I purchased it because I wanted an extra monitor to review my spreadsheets. I like the extra view and for the money it was a great investment.

one_review_title: On our way to buy a second!
one_review_text: Love the screen size. Great picture. Husband uses for work and the size allows him to see much more than his previous one. He is about to buy another o e to keep at our weekend house.

one_review_title: You get what you pay for
one_review_text: Originally I bought this monitor as a secondary screen for my laptop which was completely fine to scroll through my twitch chat or to watch videos from YouTube or Facebook etc.... but if you want a gaming monitor look somewhere else, the input lag is like 4 second which renders it unplayable,to be honest. The employees were aware enough to let me know before I bought it though :)
Very nice monitor! Colors are vibrant but not overwhelming, and text is crisp enough so I don't have to use my computer glasses :-)
very good monitors, I bought 2 to use as a at home civil 3d machine and gaming computer. so far doing great at both.
Bought this after one of my other monitors quit unexpectedly the day before going back to work. Needed something inexpensive that would work with my setup. No issues at this time

Whether you use this monitor to watch TV or as a second monitor for your laptop, you will not be disappoint in the image quality. Setup is a breeze. The colors are clear and bright. This is a good purchase.

one_review_title: Nice Large Size and Nice Clear Picture
one_review_text: Since I do a lot of writing I wanted an upgrade from the the 18 inch monitor I was already using. The LG 24" is much wider and clearer and does the job.

one_review_title: Great Entry Level General Purpose Monitor
one_review_text: Bought two of these for desktop computers for our kids.  Used for schoolwork, gaming, and general web browsing.  Great quality, tilt feature, came with HDMI cables.  Perfectly happy, would purchase again.
Good monitor for a good price.  It was easy to set up.  I have had it for a little over a month and have not had any issues.

Bought this to replace my old monitor.
I am pleased with it and it suits my need for extending my laptop display.
Works well with streaming videos as well as general computing needs.

My 11 year old monitor is having issues so this was an inexpensive replacement. I like the picture and clarity of my old monitor better but this one serves the purpose. Next time I would spend a bit more for better refresh and picture.

one_review_title: Great monitor if you can get it on sale.
one_review_text: Great monitor. I purchased this on sale for $70 off. I use it for work, and it's a perfect monitor for size and ease of use.

one_review_title: Just what I needed for a second monitor
one_review_text: New business owner, and needed an extra monitor...nothing fancy; just so I didn’t have to switch between windows and such on my MacBook.  Love it.  Such a simple thing helps me be more productive.
Needed new monitors for home office.  These work perfectly for replacing the ones that need to go back to my office.  Like the smaller base.  They take up less room on the desk.
Color clarity size all terrific. Customer service was excellent we needed this to replace an old monitor that stopped working. Thanks
Great size screen for a quality price. Basic inexpensive monitor. No issues yet and hopefully that remains for a while.
Got this for my wife's home office and the picture quality is great.  Good monitor for someone looking to have in addition to their laptop screen.

This monitor is amazing. I don't know about gaming but for professional applications like graphic design or video editing it works great. The colors are pretty close. I honestly didn't think it was possible for a monitor under $600 to properly render colors in a graphic design environment but this is absolutely amazing.

If you want a super basic monitor this is it. If you are looking for 4k Hi rez display with a very adjustable armature. This isn't that. My only complaint is every once in a while I get distortion but I don't know if that is the connectors or the wire or both. I used the wires that came with it. Once I disconnect the wire and plug it back in though the issue goes away.
This was a replacement for my work monitor. If you are ok with 1080p AND value dual HDMI, its a fine deal. Plus you get a well built stand that tilts.
This monitor was a snap to assemble, and hook up.  It is the perfect size and easy to adjust the settings.  Thank you Best Buy for putting in on sale!  I am now a "3 monitor" gal!
Excellent buy. In stalls easy. Price right. Bestbuy was very helpful in making my choice
Monitor is good quality for daily working from home. Picture is clear and sharp. Just wish it was a glossy screen that was borderless, but for the sale price and quality, it’s a great buy.
Great second monitor!!  No glare, easy to set up, works perfectly, easy to move around.
I’m not a gamer so I can’t say how it would look for that application.  For just everyday home office use it’s fantastic and the price is great.
Bought for employee's computer and since the existing one didn't have the correct connectors for the new computer.

I bought 2 for my home office, I’ve been working from home With them for almost 6 months and no complaints. The only thing I would change is maybe getting monitors that tilt- but other than that I love them!

I bought this monitor due to the price of it being an open box item at Best Buy. I am completely happy with my purchase and the staff at Best Buy did a great job to ensure everything was still in the open box before it was shipped to me. This computer monitor allows me to be more efficient with my full time employer. Thanks Best Buy.
I bought this monitor to use as a second to my laptop/screen.  I couldn’t be happier.  Everything about it I really like!!! No complaints!

one_review_title: Easy set up. Uses hdmi cable.
one_review_text: My vga connector wouldn't seat all the way. I had lines in the picture. No problem with an hdmi cable. Simple to put together. I like it.
They make a beautiful computer screen. A bit pricey but you you want speed and quality it’s worth the money. Lg is a reliable brand
Wanted a monitor to get me through this work-at-home stuff. This is a fine choice for the work I do. Easy to set up. Will eventually be great as a second monitor for home use.
a great buy. the optics are much better than our old monitor. had some problem booting it up.

one_review_title: A great monitor, especially for the price.
one_review_text: This is our 2nd LG monitor. The quality is excellent. We have multiple devices connected to it. It is perfect for remote learning.

one_review_title: Great monitor for classes and entertainment.
one_review_text: I bought this monitor for the convenience of typing my notes and watching my lectures at the same time. But the screen became much more as I learned to go back and for between my computer and laptop. Now I have my switch hooked up and have the ease of switching modes when needed. It is a great for work and relaxation. Great buy!
This monitor is nice.  Easy to hook up.  Easy to use.  Reasonably priced.
The graphics are sharp, the picture is bright, and it has worked well so far (two weeks).
Kid needed a monitor as sometimes the ipad screen isnt tpp kind. Purchased it on sale, great find! Does what we need it to do!!
Awesome picture!! Love this monitor great for my everyday work on the computer and just as great for watching videos!
Great monitors.  Bought 2 of them for work.  Not one problem with them

this is my second set of LG monitors.   this set is a little higher wattage and thus brighter.   this was to set up a second home office with twin monitors.   you do need to learn how to use the single button to manage monitor set up.
Good product with multiple connection options. HDMI and display port. Plug and play.
I bought this for my son's college dorm room, so he could hook up his laptop as well as his PlayStation.  It works great and it's easy to switch between sources without having another device.
really like the monitor.  It is easy to use and has a great picture
Great monitor but I had to purchase due to a time crunch and my original purchase got lost in the mail.
It was a good choice for interne. The colors are good when viewing and playing my games.

one_review_title: Works well and a good price
one_review_text: This is a good size monitor for up close gaming. Does the job and more affordable than most.
BOUGHT THIS MONITOR NOT KNOWING TOO MUCH ABOUT THE BRAND FOR MONITORS, BUT I'M HAPPY TO SAY THAT THEIR MONITORS AND AWESOME, JUST LIKE THEIR TELEVISIONS.
Bought this for my wife to use with her computer and she loves. Very clear pictures and good for watching movies.
use it for amateur radio.  Resolution is great. Thinking about getting another one because of the programs I use

one_review_title: Great monitor to hook to laptop
one_review_text: Needed this to see detail in vector works for theater design program. The laptop view just wasn’t getting the detail That was needed. This makes the design process so much easier.

one_review_title: Perfect size for my office needs.
one_review_text: So far the monitors have performed as expected and meet my work needs in the office and at the home office.
This monitor had all the things I was looking for in a budget monitor. Size, inputs and most of all, price is what drove me to purchase this monitor.
great addition to my office as a second working viewing and larger station
.......................its a good monitor. Warzone runs alot smoother than using a TV
Needed a reliable monitor for my child's home schooling. Item was as advertised. Awsome purchase.

This monitor was a lifesaver. Right before mandatory stay at home order my company had already began work from home alternating schedules to account for social distancing. I was a part of first group and purchased this monitor for my quick office build initiative. I am so happy I purchased my only regret is that I did not purchase another at the same time. ❤️
I love the free-sync capability’s and how I can go to a bunch of split screens.  I only buy LG for computer monitors.
Works great at a good price. I got tired of squinting at laptop screens.
Purchased this to replace a smaller monitor for an older family member. It is clear and the size is perfect!

one_review_title: Quality monitor for a decent price
one_review_text: works as advertised. Great picture quality. Wish there was a couple of different inputs but not a big issue

one_review_title: Overall a great Monitor with a minor issue brightn
one_review_text: I got this monitor on a great sale so I'm happy. Overall a great monitor, would definitely recommend. just some tiny minor issues with the brightness. It doesn't seem to go as bright as my ACER gaming monitor. Plus the color custom seems a bit limited.

This was bought as a second monitor for a laptop being used for working from home.  The monitor is light, bright and the contrast good.  Resolution is great.  The rating provided is for this use - it is not used for gaming or tasking video features. I am very happy with this monitor, we’ll have to wait and see about the longer term reliability.
I bought this monitor to upgrade to 1080p from an old one I had and it was perfect, I’ve had no problems. It’s a great monitor
I'm not an expert in monitors, but it works, looks good, and it wasn't super expensive.
Having 2 monitors helps me online teach better. This screen is simple to use and connect.
This is a nice monitor for a computer. Clear picture have no issues
Love it! It it fits for what I need; which is work.
Nice monitor for general use. Bought on sale, so happy with purchase. While the stand has tilt control, you cannot adjust the height.
Perfect for working at home. I’m using as a second monitor along with laptop.
Good value for the price. Its not fancy, but my son has no complaints with gaming at 1080p/60

one_review_title: Monitor pairs well with my laptop!
one_review_text: The monitor pairs well with my laptop for teleworking and video-conferencing.
This monitor is pretty good. It does everything it advertises and I didn't have to deal with blacklight bleed or anything.
The vivid vibrant color display is what sold me on the two LG monitors I purchased from Best Buy.
Bought this monitor to use with my surface. Has 2 HDMI ports and a decent picture. Wish it would have came with wall mounting screws.
Love this monitor. Very easy to use and the display is great.
Highly recommend this product. Right price point for this screen size. Top Quality.
I bought this monitor a couple of months ago and all I can say is that it works great for the price !
Easy to setup and picture is great using HDMI. Price was excellent at my local BB.
Great value for the money! I’d definitely buy this again.
Needed a second monitor to link to my laptop for more work space. This one works perfectly for what I need it for.
Purchased this for my 15 year old son for his birthday. He plays his Xbox one this monitor.
Great clear and clean monitor at a great sale price.  Just the right size for what I need.

one_review_title: good price on "Deal of the Day"
one_review_text: this monitor exceeded my expectations. Very nice. LG did good with this one.
perfect monitor....great pic...easy to hook up.........
Great product and worth of money. I love the product and easily play with it.
It's really good with gaming settings. You can put it on really fast to for milliseconds

one_review_title: Great Picture but Too Big for My Desk
one_review_text: EZ to connect with great picture.  Just way too big for my desk.  Went with old 18” monitor.
I bought two and use them primarily for work. I think they look great and I haven’t had any issues with them.

one_review_title: A SUPER BUY FOR A WIDE SCREEN MONITOR
one_review_text: I have had my LG 24 inch IPS LED FHD FreeSync Monitor for a four weeks and I am very pleased with it.  Never had a wide screen and wasn't sure if I would like it ... wow what I have been missing all this time :)
-Only thing I did not like it the size of the plug. It does not work well with wall plugs and even some plug-ins because it is too big and covers other outlets.

one_review_title: excellent monitor for work from home
one_review_text: works great, no issues. port options are great because work laptop has vga output and personal laptop has hdmi. this monitor can handle both easily.
Clear image and plenty big to easily manage all documents and spreadsheets
Use this everyday.  It’s a good screen size.  Wish it could adjust the tilt.  Other than that it is great.
Like the Summary says this is an excellent inexpensive monitor used for home office.

This monitor will not turn on once you plug it in.  It goes on for 3seconds, won’t connect, then it turns off. I had to spend time on line researching why it would constantly not connect, then turn off. You have to turn it on, then unplug it and plug it in again. That is the only way it turns on permanently. It’s not good for a monitor to do this. It should just turn on and connect. I wouldn’t recommend this monitor.

I bought this monitor to replace the screen when my MacBook Pro screen stopped working. Way better than paying to have the laptop screen replaced. Only downside is it is now a desktop Mac instead of a laptop.
This is exactly what we needed.  We even got it quicker than expected.

one_review_title: Excellent monitor and suits me fine.
one_review_text: I'm definitely not a techie, so setting the monitor up as an add-on to my laptop computer was a little difficult.  With some help from friends, I got it worked out.  I found out later that if I unplug the monitor to use the outlet for something else, the monitor seemed to unpair with the computer.
Excellent monitor.  The price was good and the screen is very clear.

I love this size monitor, it works for what I’m using it for. I wanted a faster response time for games, but the cost for that type of monitor is out of my reach right now, but this is better then nothing at all.
WORKS GREAT EXACTLY WHAT WE NEEDED.  DUAL MONITOR SET UP.
Can’t really find anything negative to offer here. Great price and works fine.
Good product and easy to set up. Very good value. Works as expected
Monitor is great easy set up. For the price it was great
This monitor is easy to use and great picture. I have two of them!
Needed this for all my online college course due to COVID, Great quality and makes my life easier.

Clear overall picture. No figuring.
This screen is perfect and inexpensive.
Great monitor for the price only wish the height were adjustable
Excellent graphics for the money. Great choice for a starter.

one_review_title: Great monitor for at home use
one_review_text: I was hoping to do "dual monitors" at home with the 2 monitors I purchased but I was unable to do this due to my computer not having two ports for 2 monitors.  So, I upgraded 2 computers at home by changing out to 24 inch monitors on both at home computers. Now I have 2 spare monitors for when I bring my work computer home to work at home.
Crisp picture we use it for Zoom meeting and works great price was great as well
Works well. No complaints. Might get another one to have a dual display

one_review_title: Perfect monitor for working from home
one_review_text: I was looking for a high quality monitor in my price range, this fit the bill.
This is a very good monitor.  The only exception is that there is no camera located on the monitor.  One can be added but none on it.

I have only had this monitor for 4 days but I have 30 hours of screen time on it. (it actually can tell you how long the screen has been on for which is neat) 

I am using this for both an external monitor for my Macbook Pro and for playing Xbox on.  When im playing games at full screen its fine.  Pictures clear, coloring is off a little.  But the thing I am not liking about this monitor when not being used for gaming is almost everything. 

Like i just stated, coloring is off.  Everything seems to be a paler shade of what it looks like on my macbook or when i had my xbxo hooked up to a different TV.  And as far as i can see there isnt a saturation slider in picture adjustments.   Just Brightness and Contrast.  Sharpness is also there but only available depending on a view different picture options. (Ive found that either 60 or 70 in sharpness looks the best.  It increments in 10s)
Smaller images such as youtube thumbnails are hard to see clearly.  If youre planning on getting this for photo/video editing, or even just watching videos that are full screen, look for something else.  Smaller text isnt clear.  The little "TM" in the Best Buy logo is almost non existent on my screen.  At the time of writing this I have have the screen with a youtube window on the left side, and this window on the right.  I am watching a video with a Mac desktop and i cant even read what time it says in the top right corner.  Ive either become so accustomed to using my mac that has a screen resolution of 1920x1200 that everything lower than that just seems awful, or this screen isnt true 1080p.  Even when i have my mac turned to 1680x1050, my mac is better looking.  

So unless im just not finding the right settings in the monitor this isnt going to work.  Low saturation, image quality is subpar are the main things for me.  

I am most likely going to keep the monitor for the rest of the week then return it.  With everything thats going on in the world right now please do a little more research on monitors because of not being able to see what it looks like in stores.Read more

If you're in need of a basic IPS monitor though this one has a good overall screen. Colors and contrast are good. There is some backlight bleed, but that is to be expected at this price range. It's not distracting at all. 

The only major downside to this monitor is the stand quality. It's rightly trash. It's super wobbly and the screen only tilts forward and back, not side to side or up and down. Mine also has a slight tilt to it, so the screen does not sit perfectly straight horizontally.

I don't know if I'd recommend this for the full price, but on sale it's a great deal and a good cheap option for a good IPS display.

one_review_title: Will not use a TV as a monitor again!
one_review_text:
I literally could have purchased a TV, larger screen than this monitor, at a lower price.... but I'm glad I didn't. I used a TV on my previous desktop and it did the job but it didn't look great. This monitor makes a huge difference. The picture quality is amazing.
I receive a great picture from many angles.   

The reason why I purchased this monitor over other monitors is because it has 2 HDMI and a VGA input. This gives me the ability to connect older desktops to this monitor and flexibility to  possibly keep 2 PCs connected - or connect an Xbox and a PC at the same time. 

The antiglare on this monitor is also amazing... this is important for me since I am near bright lights and this monitor is virtually unaffected! 

I also like that there is a headphone jack on the monitor
My only negative with this monitor is that is not adjustable. I knew that going in, so I'm not lowering my rating for this. This monitor does have an excellent tilt range though. I think it sits at a good, height, although I could always adjust my desk chair's height if needed.Read more

one_review_title: Great resolution at a great price
one_review_text: I was pleasantly surprised at the high quality images on the screen.  Super easy to assemble and set up.  Greatly improved over my old screen.  It makes work a lot more pleasant.
Not the best screen resolution, ok monitor for everyday use. Not gaming.
Terrible dead pixels after 2 hours of having it returned for the same model and samthing happens 3 hours later

one_review_title: Excellent monitor for an excellent price
one_review_text: Caught this monitor on sale one day, and bought it for a dual monitor setup. Build quality is okay, screen is pretty nice, and 75hz refresh rate is just a bonus on top of that. Pretty easy to assemble as well. Only negative is that you can't adjust monitor height, but I didn't expect you would be able to with a $130 monitor

I bought this as a secondary monitor. Normally I would have bought an Acer as I've bought several really great monitors in this brand and I needed a monitor that I could put on a mounting arm instead of a stand. The last Acer (8 months ago) has some issues and the Acer service and support is a real pain to deal with, even under warranty, so I decided not to purchase that brand this time. I personally like LG products and this one was the right size for a really good price. Easy set up, it's mounted on an arm instead of using the stand, the color is great, there's no lag but I'm not gaming which could make a difference. My next monitor purchase will most likely be another LG.
Easy install, very clear vibrant screen. Great buy for the price.
It was fine when i received it. Good quality, almost gave it 5 stars but after a week, i turned on my computer and suddenly i saw a dead pixel on my monitor.
I bought 2 of these. The color and clarity were off on one of them.
Have to send my monitor to the LG Electronic store for service. My monitor is now working will not. Can't get any connection

It has hard with the pandemic to find a monitor - this was available for same day pick up at a very reasonable about $130 - it is large 24 inch screen that is really clear - easy to set up 
My wife is very happy not trying to work off a laptop monitor

The monitor is fantastic, particularly for the price. Easy setup, crisp and clean images. Great coloring.  However it is very unstable due to the relatively heavy monitor supported by a very cheap  plastic stand. It feels as it is going to topple over any minute. It actually moves (shimmies) with every slight bump on the desk.

one_review_title: Great clear picture, easy to set-up
one_review_text:
Purchased the monitor on-line with same day curb-side pick up.  Had the monitor up and running in three hours from the time I placed the order.
Graphics quality of the monitor is excellent and it fits easily on the desk as a large screen display with my laptop. 
Great online/curbside process and excellent products. Thanks

Bought as a second monitor to use with a much older one (not LG), and was totally surprised at how bad the picture quality was on the LG unit compared to my old non-LG unit.

So I promptly took it back and get a competitor's brand and have been happy ever since.

Got two of these for the home office - using on both a Dell laptop with Windows 10 and my Mac Pro.  In both cases the displays are very clear and easy to read.  Highly recommend, when the are on sale. Only minor gripe is they do not swivel, they only tilt back and forth, and the base feels a little cheap (lightweight plastic feeling).
The graphics show really well and screen is big enough to see everything. I brought this for my son who is a gamer and he loves it!

Upon shifting work routine from office to home office, the monitor has helped transition from laptop small screen to large screen monitor. The clarity is great and the setup is super easy. No issues at all. Works perfectly.
I bought this monitor for my Fiancée, and it worked fine. That is until less that a month later it went out on me. I never found out if it was a faulty power cable or not
Went to a store that had one. They didn't have it, so in that store I bought from a different store. An hour later I get a text saying it's not in stock.

Wanted to but a monitor for my wife’s laptop. Bought this because the size was perfect. However, it could only be connected with old fashioned cables, no hdmi capability. I returned it right after Christmas.

Great moniter, needed to purchase an adaptor to connect to my older computer, but it's a perfect size for my needs.  Clarity of the screen is fine, it matches the price range.  If you want something with better resolution, you'll need to pay more money for one.  Over all I am happy with this purchase.
Great graphics and easy to hook up.  My son loved it and has been on it with his new gaming computer.
This is a basic monitor but it does what I need it to do.  Crisp graphics for everyday usage.  Price is right.  Wish it had a height adjustable stand but thats a minor inconvenience.

one_review_title: Best Price and Best Size for the Resolution+75hz !
one_review_text: Great brightness, feels adequately different than 60 fps, has "gamer" oriented settings, which comes from one button underneath the middle of the display with joystick-like funtionality!
I purchased this monitor to use for working from home. It was easy to setup and put together. The display is nice and clear.
Great picture and easy to set up.  Works perfect with a laptop to extend the screen.
Good graphics, easy plug and play setup, nice price point for LG monitor
Two HDMI, great clarity, use for Gaming (monitor wall) with lower power needs and thinner boarder for the price.
Easy to set up. Crisp display. Affordable price. Would highly recommend. Using as a second monitor. Didn’t want to spend too much but still wanted good quality.

I do quite a bit of hobby photo work, and this monitor was perfect for home use. Sharp resolution and vivid color, makes removing imperfections on photos really easy to do. Simple to set up, and comes with the HDMI cable - no extras to purchase.

one_review_title: Excellent display for the price point!
one_review_text: Easy to assemble, excellent screen.  can't go wrong for the price point (Purchased on sale $109).
Great monitor for the price.  Easy to hook up and very good picture.
Does the job well, The fast response time setting does seem to ghost in games, so just use normal setting for response time
Cmae when promised. Setup quite easy. It is clear and large enough for the work I do.
My surface book does not connect to lg monitor. A Saturday completely wasted.

one_review_title: It is a great value for the money.
one_review_text: I love the clarity and picture on the screen.  It was a very good decision to purchase this monitor through Best Buy.
Total Waste of time. just like this review. Spotswood

I really like this panel, not much tinkering is necessary here. Beautiful overall colors out of the box. Got it for sub-$100. Great second panel for gaming/basic computing. I would recommend this product. Only con I can think of off the top is that stand, it's a bit wobbly. I ended up having it mounted after some thought. I like joystick for the UI interface, easiest input I've seen.
Great size and even better graphics. The ability to add a second screen at such a great price is a plus.
Purchased for  client who needed a new monitor. Go it on sale and it has a beautiful display for the money. Menus are fairly easy to follow. Set up was easy.
My son enjoys the monitor. He use them for gaming and the picture is pretty clear.

one_review_title: Good sign monitor for gaming and school work
one_review_text: My daughter absolutely love's her new monitor. She uses it for gaming and school work. Was not sure if the 75 refresh rate would work for her games but decided to give it a try since it was on sale. She is very glad we went with this model. It work's wonderful with her new gaming desktop which also is five stars. Happy with the price, size, refresh rate and the color. It has been serving it's purpose well. Nothing brings me more joy than seeing my little girl happy. Thanks Best Buy for selling great products and always willing to help when there's a problem.

And do you’re able to scoop this up on a sale I would jump on it fast. I’ve made the switch from console gaming on a large TV to this monitor and everything just seems seamless. Also built in speakers while nothing great are a well received idea for the price range this falls in
Very affordable and great clarity screen used as a second monitor while working from home.  Very satisfied.
Loved the price with my points. The display is clear.
Purchased this as a second monitor for my laptop and it works great - easy to mount on the wall, good picture and HDMI cable was included. Good price as well - definitely pleased with the purchase.
Setup was very easy and the picture is bright and clear. Can’t beat the price for the size of this monitor as well.
Beautiful picture quality. Easy to hook up. Plug and play right out of the box. Simply install the monitor base.

Easy to set up and display quality is excellent. 
Good buy for the price

one_review_title: Great monitor for a great price!
one_review_text: I needed a monitor for working at home.  This one has exceeded my expectations.  Very clear, easy to set up.

If you are looking for a decent overall monitor with good specs at a decent price, I can't complain about this one. I was too focused on value and wish I had considered a built in camera, but that is an easy add-on. It was super simple to assemble and hook up. I had to get accustomed to using the audio jack from my monitor to my headset with the cord coming out right at my keyboard vs. the chassis of my PC, however, since I do not use PC speakers. I'll be getting a Bluetooth headset soon to overcome that obstacle, something I should already have done anyway.

one_review_title: Excellent addition to my other to monitors
one_review_text: This monitor was very reasonably priced.  I have had no issues with it.  The picture was great and the set up was easy.  I would recommend this monitor to my friends and co-workers.

one_review_title: Excellent choice for my freshman student
one_review_text: Bought this for my freshman student for use in dorm for both studies and functions well as a gaming display. So far has not disappointed and picture quality is crystal clear and no lag in video / audio

overall, i have grown to really like this monitor.  Given I am primarily, using it as twin to the other EXACT same monitor i already bought when the whole WFH thing started.  now i purchased another one to a have double monitors for my laptop.  Success!  can't beat for the price.  Very happy, very easy to install!
Good quality monitor, great picture, and easy setup.
Easy set-up, good picture and a great price. Roku interface very intuitive.

At this price point, you can’t beat the value this monitor brings to the table! It’s got a great picture, with plenty of customization for tweaking your image. It’s also got a very sleek look, and a simple but very effective single button interface (4 way directional plus push to confirm). 2 HDMI’s is also handy if you might have 2 devices you might want to switch between.

Packaging was good
Assembly instructions clear and easy 
Overall, very good

Upgraded from older Dell 22" monitors with lower max resolution to these 24" LG's.  Picture clarity and colors are fantastic.  Off axis viewing deteriorates clarity a little but not an issue as I sit right in front of them.  The included HDMI cable is a nice addition.  Overall happy with these monitors as it has improved my WFH experience and increased productivity with a higher resolution.  Definitely recommended for a budget friendly monitor upgrade.

I'm extremely pleased with this purchase.  I have two of these monitors side by side - which provides a nice bump in screen real estate.  I had the monitors out of the box and up and running in less than 10 minutes.  Quality is excellent with high resolution whether working on a spreadsheet, writing a letter or reviewing building plan sets.   Monitors come with standard HDMI cords.  I needed to purchase Dock to Display HDMI cables.
Easy to set up and great picture. Does exactly what I bought it for.

I bought this to use as a second monitor with my laptop and it works great! The picture is great, and the screen does tilt, though it doesn't raise and lower from the base. It's fairly lightweight so it's easy to move around.
Excellent monitor for the price. Clarity and picture quality is excellent.

Easy setup, just plugged it in on my MacMini.  Controls are almost self explanatory.  Automatic power controls work perfectly as well.  No intervention was necessary.  I don't game but the graphics are excellent.
Great monitors. Clear and perfect size to ya e for dual monitor setup.
Comparing to other monitors, this one is clear and crisp with easy for gaming. Great present for beginners. They love it.

Bought this for work from home.  Great graphics, but limited to only HDMI.  Originally only used with my HP laptop with HDMI. Once I had to bring my equipment home, I realized I should have got a monitor with alternative port types.  But, this one is good for HDMI.

Had to purchase a monitor to work from home as a complementary screen for dual screen usage with my laptop! Easy to set up. Just plug and play. Viewing quality is decent . Sometimes when turning on my laptop doesn’t resister it so I just have to unplug the hdmi cord and then replug it! But this monitor was a steal and I’m happy with my purchase.

The BEST thing about this monitor is how easy it was to set up. I just plugged it into the wall and then used the included HDMI cord to plug into my laptop. Instantly the monitor was up and running with no issues. 
The monitor automatically resizes the excel UI when dragging from laptop to monitor which is really nice. 
There is one downside, it does wobble a little like folks have mentioned in the review. But for my Work From Home setup it is perfect.

I needed a big screen for my laptop to be more productive working from home. I thought it would be too big. But perfect size, easy setup. And I feel productive so I bought another one. Now I have the ultimate work from home space. Can you be too productive??? Thank you Best Buy always comes through when I need them.

I bought 2 of these monitors two create a dual-monitor desktop work space. The are connected to a Lenovo C930 Yoga laptop through a Totu USB-C Thunderbolt hub with dual HDMI outputs. 

I am very happy with these monitors. The image is sharp and the color rendition seems perfect, even though I did not change any of the default settings. The viewing angle is excellent - there is almost no angle too large where the image is degraded.

I am not a gamer, so I have not pushed them to their limits with fast moving video. My laptop does not offer the AMD Free Sync, so I cannot comment on that feature. 

I am very satisfied with them, and I think they represent an excellent value.

Both HDMI ports work great, speakers and audio pass through are flawless, HDMI image is crisp and clean, VGA image is blurry and caused me a headache so I took off a star but VGA is a dying standard so it shouldn't matter, however if you're buying only for the vga input and will not be using the HDMI ports I can't recommend this monitor.

one_review_title: Great Monitor, Great Price and Great Value
one_review_text: If you are interested in a high quality, easy to configure monitor, this monitor is for you.  The best feature of this monitor is the single control button that allows you to adjust everything from inputs, color and resolution.  All other monitors have separate buttons to make changes but this monitor is one button does it all.  The monitor also has two HDMI inputs which allow you to add other devices for high quality video.

i bought this as a starter monitor and it’s proven to be quite amazing ! i love the quality. i use it as my secondary monitor while gaming and streaming and it’s very nice! definitely worth the price!
This was a replacement for a smaller version that was pretty old.  Great color and clear viewing. Easy set up with plug and play.

one_review_title: Great Monitor for a great price!
one_review_text: If you need an affordable Monitor for watching video, doing work and everything in-between then you'll enjoy this monitor. It has 2 HDMI ports and when it goes on sale for $129.99 its and extremely good deal! This is actually my second time buying this because I needed to update the monitor on another computer in my house. I've owned this monitor since late last year and before that my other LG (which this model replaced) lasted about 5 years. At $199.99 This is still a good monitor, but definitely go for it at $129.99 when it goes on sale. You won't be sorry!

I now have two of these monitors, and love them.The picture is crystal clear, and on point. Easy setup and much better with the toggle on the bottom of the monitor. The only downside is it doesn't have a display port, but i got around it with HDMI to Display port.

I needed a larger monitor, and this LG was exactly the size that I needed for the space I had available.  The quality of the picture is very good, response is quick, and the price was exceptional.  It was delivered quickly, also.  Overall, I am very pleased with the purchase.

Ordered and delivered within 2 days for an excellent price of $109.99.  Using as a second monitor for working at home during the uncertain Coronavirus time.  

Works perfectly out of the box, on 3 different laptops (HP, Lenovo and MacBook Pro).  HDMI cable included, had to buy an adapter for the Mac.   Excellent resolution and ease of use in extending displays.

Great item.  Plan to purchase another for a dual display when back on sale.

I needed a new monitor when my all-in-one computer hard drive failed. There were few available and this one was a little higher priced than budget gaming level 24" monitors. It turned out to be a higher quality than so called budget gaming monitored priced slightly lower but well worth the money. Worked right out of the box per specifications.
Good basic monitor with hdmi connection.  Felt older Dell monitor was a bit sharper quality and built in camera and speakers could have been options to make this monitor an excellent choice.

one_review_title: Nice screen for a good price
one_review_text: I like the size and the clarity.  Was easy to help me k up
Great monitor & great price. Bought this for my 14 year old for his gaming computer & he's very happy with it.

one_review_title: Great monitor for constant daily work use
one_review_text: The LG 24" monitor is the perfect size for a typical work setup. I only use one, but two would pair easily.  Nice resolution, easy to set up and get rolling.  Only knock from 5 to 4 stars is due to the stand - slight wobble, which - depending on how stable your desk is - may be noticeable on video conferencing / calls.  I've since mounted mine (easily, no issues) to an adjustable monitor mount with VESA adapter.  Overall a great monitor especially for the price.
Clear screen, crisp picture, great size and not too heavy!
Fabulous picture on screen. Would recommend this product
Good intro gaming screen on a budget. Definitely recommend this if you are looking for a good deal.

Great quality; good price easy to install.





Dome
The monitor works perfectly ok. It's good for gaming, no screen rips or fps lag has occurred.

Good colors, refresh, resolution. The only nit was my own fault for not noticing- that it wouldn’t move vertically. This was important for my situation.  If that feature wasn’t important to you, i would rate 5 stars.
I bought this for my sons homeschooling this year and it’s a great buy for a decent price!
We love this monitor, great value and great visuals - perfect for schoolwork and/or gaming!

Set up was very easy and the monitor is lightweight so it is easy to move and assemble as needed. The graphics are great if you are looking for an affordable gaming monitor. Overall, I have nothing to complain about.

I can't really comment on price as I've never had to buy my own monitor before. However, I really like the quality. Its a good size and actually pretty light weight. Might be a bit long but its nice to have a larger screen for working.

one_review_title: Very good display on a quality product.
one_review_text: This is a great monitor that worked right out of the box with no special setup and very little adjusting for a super display.
Great monitor for the cost.  Looks sleek and has a great image.  Chords included.

This monitor is super lightweight - your first clue that it isn't a high-end monitor.  The images are good for gaming and office work. Wouldn't recommend to those doing serious graphics design.
The monitor tilts but does not raise up or down - you'll need to stack some books under it if you're tall and need a better height angle.
There is one multi-function button on the bottom under the LG symbol to control power, toggling through options, etc. I would have preferred a separate power button, but it works (for now).

It comes with a basic 3 foot HDMI cable.  There are 2 HDMI ports and an earphone jack on the back. - no USB ports if you want to power your speakers.

It is super thin - our pc cam isn't snug on top as it is on our Samsung monitor.
Overall - it is decent if you just need a basic monitor. If you're spending a lot of time at the computer, upgrade to a larger, better quality monitor with more ports.Read more

The monitor itself was perfect picture showed good and it had and audio jack for headphones or speakers the only thing that I don’t like is the stand the stand is horrible it’s always shaking and rocking and easy to fall it’s better to just mount it instead of using the stand
GREAT QULITY PICTURE AND THE PRICE WONT BREAK YOUR BANK. I BOUGHT TWO SO I CAN HAVE DUAL MONITORS AND THEY WORK FANTASTIC.
i had to reuse my laptop the other day it was so much smaller! love my 24" screen especially when playing games! love it! love it!
Great 24 inch Monitor picture quality very good. Fast and easy to install.
Nice display and good quality.  Easy to set up.  Menu buttons easy to access.
Good monitor, very clear. Easy to hook up. Love the tilt and swivel feature.

one_review_title: Good choice for work from home dual monitor setup
one_review_text: Needed couple of basic monitors for setting up a dual display work from home setup. This fit the bill perfectly. Brightness was bit subpar but the price made it worthwhile

one_review_title: Great monitor for working from home (and gaming)
one_review_text: I bought this monitor primarily for working from home (thanks Corona) but wanted something I could use for casual gaming. The 60 FPS is more than enough for the games I play (Borderlands 3, Wow) and it’s a great screen for work. Couldn’t be happier!

Purchased this to replace my 11 year old one. Easy to hook up and update my video drivers.
Crystal clear display as other purchasers posted Would buy again to have 2 monitors!
Purchased this monitor for my son! Great quality, color, sound. uses it for PS games and camera video editing! Great price great product

I really love this monitor.  I had been think about upgrading my MacBook Air to an iMAC, but decided to try hooking my laptop to a bigger screen monitor.  This monitor is perfect, as I realized I only wanted a bigger screen and did not need spend thousands on a bigger computer.  I also have a laptop for my job as I work from home 4 days a week, with two HDMI ports, I have both laptops connected and can switch back and forth.  Saved me a lot money. Thanks.

I picked this up for a dual monitor option for our home theater, to assist with troubleshooting and mirroring the projector.  Works great with HDMI input, fast and responsive.  Energy savings features are good.  Setup out of the box was fast and easy.  For the money this was a great option as a no frills easy to use monitor for AV setup.

Excellent screen for job's dutties. Very pleasant and confortable. Excellent for games too! And for a goood price!

Recomended!

one_review_title: Great monitor for a entry level gaming system.
one_review_text: Got this for my nephew and his first gaming computer. Looks great for not being 4k. For the price it's a good monitor.
Great picture. Very easy on the eyes. At night the screen dims.

It is enough to extend a laptop screen and it has enough graphics for reading documents and watching TV shows. I cannot be sure if it has a super high-quality display because I do not run games with this monitor.
Excellent picture quality. Clean, unobtrusive styling. The included stand was very easy to assemble.
I’m impressed by the clarity and detail shown on the screen.
I use this monitor for both my MacBook bro and my PS4. Looks great simple to set up, no issues so far

one_review_title: Great monitor for business and gamers
one_review_text: This monitor is basically used for business purpose, but also offers  good refreshing 144 MHz for games i’m playing.  I purchased it during one day offer, so good stuff for The money.
Easy setup.  Purchased as a second screen.  Picture is as good or better than the more expensive monitor it’s paired with.

nice monitor for the price 
with nice clear resolution
We have purchased quite a few of these monitors for our desks and workstations throughout our building.  They're inexpensive and decent picture.  No complaints!

Very satisfied with this monitor. Using it for gaming on PlayStation 4, picture quality is clear and colors are great. Definitely saw increased performance in gaming versus on a regular television. Would recommend.
I got this for $120 and it was worth it. I use it on my desk and use it as an occasional second screen for my desktop and sometimes use it for my switch. The screen itself is nice.

Great monitor for the price. The picture is crisp and clear. 
The monitor is very lightweight. I have 2 of these attached to a dual monitor arm and have no issues with tilt.

one_review_title: Great screen for high action gaming
one_review_text: Great product for gaming with great screen clarity and awesome design ascetics especially the screen width size is just right for viewing! Very please with how it function.
Good monitor, works as expected. I wish it came with speakers, but that's my own preference. I use this for gaming, and it's very worth for the price.
Haven’t had any issues. Good screen quality for price.
amazing graphics for a great price excatly what I was looking for.
just started a new job. they had 18 inch monitors. LOL. Great screen for the price.

one_review_title: New Monitor for working from home
one_review_text: Size of the monitor was good, quality of picture and easy of set up was very nice.
It's really great.75hz is good for most games that I play, and the IPS gives beautiful qualify to images.

one_review_title: Great monitors for the price point
one_review_text: This monitors sits really great on the vest and it’s awesome for a office setup

These are pretty nice if you can grab them on sale. The downside is they while they do have two HDMI inputs, the have no displayport. I'm running two so I have to use an adaptor. Most cards seem to have a dvi, HDMI, and three displayport so it's inclusion would have been nice. I would not got any larger on 1920x1080. Also everything is controlled by a single joystick button.  I switch inputs a lot, makes me a little nervous about longevity. Otherwise nice vesa mountable display for the price.

one_review_title: Perfect Gaming Monitor for Entry Level Gamers.
one_review_text: Was able to snag this monitor on sale for my wife’s pc build. Its perfect for 1080p gaming. 75hz Refresh rate, isn’t too big on her desk either. Great monitor!
Great picture quality for gaming, would recommend for anyone.
Quality is great   Picture is great, Price is great.  Power switch is out of the way but takes some getting used to
I love this new monitor. I have a very clear picture! I organize photos, create slideshows and photo books for clients and the clarity of my screen is GREAT!
Bought on sale and the size and setup are great.  Use for general work; excel, teams, word, research.  Good quality and cost for this.
Easy to set up and get started. Colors look really nice, very light in weight.
The free sync will work great with gaming and it was an easy set up for my laptop.
LG lived upto it’s name. Easy to hook up. Good picture quality
With covid and having to work from home this screen is perfect. I got it when it was on sale for the price I paid you really can’t beat the quality.
I have not had it long.   Easy to assemble and automatically adjusts.   Not a fan of the adjustment controls it's like a little joystick on the power button.

one_review_title: Got them at a great price
one_review_text: Black Friday deal was great and I love the size/quality of the screens. So far no issues with them, and have been debating getting a third when they go sale again.

Excellent monitor. I have other LG’s. I like the fact that when you put your computer to sleep - it goes into power saving mode and the screen goes black - it does not display a connection lost message.
Great monitor for gaming and at a firm price. As well if lg fan highly recommend
I got it for $110. At that price it has excellent picture quality and response time. At full price, skip it and get something nicer or with a higher refresh rate
My boyfriend loves this monitor for his gaming setup! He has 3 monitors & this is his main one because it’s his favorite :)
I needed an extra monitor for my home office. This LG produces a clear and bright images. It was easy to set up as a second monitor for my laptop. No issues with this monitor so far.
I bought this for my wife’s home office, well two of them actually, and they are wonderful screens. Crisp clarity, easy to use buttons and a perfect viewing size.
Cheap monitor with a pretty decent picture. No height adjust does subtract but that's the case with most monitors on the cheaper side
Monitor is great. Build quality is great. My Lenovo monitor from work pales in comparison to the build quality that this came with. Overall, would recommend for anyone just setting up a home office.
Great budget gaming monitor. Affordable and gets the job done
Works perfectly as a second screen in our home office. The price was great for such a large screen.
Being forced to work from home we needed to find an affordable monitor fast. This was one was on sale and the picture is perfect!  Really pleased with this purchase and the price was unbeatable!
Easy setup and quality definition for the price. No description of included hardware on the box, it comes with a HDMI cable but if you use an older wired connection be sure to purchase it too.

I personally love LG. And this monitor did not let me down. I use this monitor for Xbox 1 x and PS4 pro. Perfect. Very nice picture and clarity. The 5ms is spot on. Bang for your buck. This is definitely the best budget monitor you'll probably find for 5ms gaming. I play a lot of fps...

Excellent monitor
Good price 
Son’s gaming monitor
The monitor is nice for its price. We were on a budget, so this fit our needs well. No complaints, we do moderate to heavy gaming and it pulls the weight.

one_review_title: Great monitor with a wide, clear screen!
one_review_text: I like this monitor very much.  It's much bigger, wider, and clearer than my old one.  It was easy to set up.
I don’t watch movies or play games on this monitor, but it’s crisp display is perfect for my home office. Easy setup.
Nice picture quality and good price.  Perfect for working at home.
Bought this to have a 2nd monitor for work. Easy to install excellent graphics.

one_review_title: Great monitor at a great price!

Super fast online ordering!
Super fast curbside pickup!
Super clear monitor!
Perfect for gaming!

Great display for the price. 
Would recommend.

 I liked it so much I bought a second one.
