Had graphics display great 


Happy customer
Love the monitor easy set up And has great color. Excellent price and comes with cord.
It’s a good starter monitor for gamers getting into the field of gaming
Great color!  Great graphics!  Great size (upgraded)!  Great price!  Obviously great value!
Excellent Image quality and value. Fast shipping. Easy install.

I game just enough to want a fairly nice monitor, but not enough to drop a lot of money on an amazing monitor. That being said, I've been very pleased with the quality of this product. I may need to play with the settings a bit to see if I can make the colors a bit brighter in some games, but it doesn't interfere with gameplay (including games where the color of things in the environment is integral to gameplay) I'm enjoying the sharp/clear image - great value for the price.

one_review_title: Great Monitor for an ok price
one_review_text: I probably wouldn't have gotten this monitor at it's full price, but Bestbuy had a sale that took it to half price.  Great monitor, no complaints other than the stand could be a little sturdier.  The monitor wobbles a bit if the table is bumped.
This has a great picture, lightweight, and was super easy to set up on my wife's laptop.
This  monitor was easy to hook up to my lab top and provided me duo screens. It was a great addition to my lab top.
The product is as described, though I was disappointed in the supplied stand. It is passable but has no tilt adjustment and by default it seems like it has a slight downward tilt.
Great price and screen looks great especially for watching stock and working from home.  Ended up purchasing a 2nd monitor for my dad.
Crisp picture. I use it as a double screen when I work at home on my laptop.
Good picture quality and plenty of size. A all around good buy for personal or business use.

one_review_title: Does exactly what a monitor should do.
one_review_text: Screen is clear and easy to read. Connects effortlessly with an HDMI cable. Just plug it in and your good to go. Makes WFH with a laptop much easier.
Easy to install on mom's computer. good value for the money

one_review_title: LG just makes super displays, monitors and TVs
one_review_text:
Very pleased with how BestBuy helped me out.  I ordered from BestBuy on-line and had ordered a TV when I wanted a monitor.  No problem.  I took the product into the BestBuy store near me and they credited me immediately and ordered the correct monitor for me.  And I didn't even have the receipt.  
In my opinion, Amazon can't compete with Best Buy for electronics.  You can always trust BestBuy and Amazon is losing ground because they are too hands-off.

one_review_title: Great monitor that is budget friendly!
one_review_text: Very solid monitor for low cost office setup! Easy setup and good resolution.

one_review_title: Good price for a basic 24" monitor
one_review_text: Easy to install, no frills monitor and is good for most functions.
Very nice for price and sync’s better easy to install and start using.
Great clarity and easy set up. Excellent value for the price.
Needed a full size monitor and this fit the budget and has performed well for the price.  I would have bought 2 if they were in stock
I am using this as a second monitor hooked up to my laptop.  It is easy to hook up with a USB cord and has a great picture.
Everything you need in a gaming monitor for console players. Deep reach and vibrant clear picture works with Freesync for Xbox One-Xbox X. Overall great monitor on the budget.
Good picture and color nice size and easy to set up.
Great quality monitor.   Good Price  Bought a pair of these

Bought this to replace a monitor that expired.  Setup was fairy easy, BUT the little toggle on the bottom which is used to make all the adjustments is frustrating and hard to  use. It is very small and you use your  finger to move it U, D, L & R. Being underneath the lower bezel, you cannot see it so all  must be done by feel. This is a very poor arrangement.  There is no led to indicate if the power is on or off. I am surprised LG would produce such a badly designed  ergonomic control for a monitor which I feel is quite overpriced.
My kids love their gaming computers.  I've had no complaints with this screen.
Purchased this monitor to add additional screen space for work.  Good quality, bright picture.  2 HDMI ports.  Decent resolution

My wife got me a pair of these monitors for my home office. They were easy to set up  and the resolution is great. Colors are vivid and the monitors have a sleek modern look. The price was right as well!

one_review_title: a great monitor with an excellent price
one_review_text: This monitor is easy to install and a perfect size.
Easy to set up and looks really great. Operation is simple and easy to manage.
Watch for sale price around 100-110. Monitor clear and crisp images even with our games.

I bought this monitor so that I could have two at my workplace. It’s a perfect set up. The picture and resolution are fantastic. It was super easy to set up and was also on sale! I’m never disappointed with Beat Buy!
picture display is of high quality recommend for use
Great picture with a very clear resolution. Perfect for viewing YouTube videos. Facebook postings etc. Affordable for just about any budget without spending a lot on bigger monitors.
Easy to set up and picture quality is very good makes using laptop easier.
Great monitor to pair with my PS4. Great specs and great color. Easy to set up!

Use in my kitchen with Logitech speakers and dish signal.
Good picture at a good price.
Got this monitor with my CyberPower PC for the ultimate gaming experience. No lag and crisp video for responsive gaming action.
Good price performance. Free Sync is helpful. I didn't see an improvement on the refresh rate
This monitor works great.  The colors are vivid and it is well worth the price.
I got this monitor to work from home and it has been excellent. No issue and great image quality display.

one_review_title: Secondary Monitor for MacBook Pro Retina 15
one_review_text: I picked this up as i needed a secondary monitor to work from home. It's a great size, value, and easy setup. My only gripe is that transitioning from a retina display laptop, you do see the difference in quality/clarity. My fonts look a bit blurry but I would imagine its related to how the video card is trying to display on this LCD. I'm sure it's great on another system, but for some reason, I just can't get as crisp of a picture as id like.

one_review_title: A good 24" monitor for a good price
one_review_text: The monitor has a 24" screen, a matte finish, which I wanted, and works well.  It has a toggle switch on the underside of the bottom of the screen, which controls most of the settings on the monitor, but there is nothing I could find that explains where the toggle switch is, what it controls or how to use it, which is rather frustrating.  If you don't stumble on the toggle switch by accident, you will probably end up returning the monitor.  Fortunately, I found it and kept the monitor.
Working from home this monitor makes looking at the screen a lot easier. And it was easy to set up
Good size monitor and has nice display. Wonderful monitor for the price!
Great monitor for the price. Easy to hook up. Great for my clients to see across the desk.

Needed a monitor for business and chose this for its size and LG was recommended by a co-worker. I like that it has multiple inputs so I can have multiple devices hook-up to it and just select the device instead of unplugging a device to use another.

one_review_title: Great monitor for dual monitor setup
one_review_text: I'm using this in an office for a dual monitor setup. It is great quality and easy to setup for dual monitors. Had all the cables I needed for my setup. Great price as well.

one_review_title: Good monitor at a good price
one_review_text:
Easy setup.  Reliable even when reconnecting via HDMI multiple times daily.  
Good resolution.  Nice monitor for the price.
Great value for the price!  Easy to setup and excellent picture.
The best monitor for the price! Great image and sound! I would HIGHLY recommend!!!
Great price on a great monitor. Easy to setup, great value!
Good quality and very easy to use and hook up. Good value for the money
Just had to replace my monitor and this was the one I selected.  The screen is really clear and the color is great.
Easy setup and good picture.  Quick and carefully shipped too.
Great picture, easy set up, would recommend to all my friends

one_review_title: Great screen size, perfect for my business.
one_review_text: Bought for my business, they are great, loved the price, ended up buying 4 total. They were easy to install and connect in pairs. The pitcher is great.

Although, I there was a snafu on the website while I was looking for 4k monitors and this was kept popping up.  I purchased it without really reading the specs., just the reviews.  It is an excellent monitor just I wanted a 4k.  I did end up returning it but wish I had kept it.  Although I wanted a 4k using multiple monitors, I only needed one 4k and the second one just with a good picture.  The LG had a great picture.
Oh well.
Easy to install and easy to use. The screen size and quality is great. Good option for desktop use.
Great clarity at a great price! Highly recommended!
If you looking for a monitor full HD and no so expensive this is the monitor to get. Simple setup. Is not 4k HD but for daily use and occasional gaming work great.
The clarity is really good on this monitor and setup was easy
Well worth the money.  I bought two and both are great.
Easy to set up and use. Very clear and greatly expands the viewing area for my Mac laptop.

For its price point, I wasn't expecting a whole lot from this monitor but in the months I've been using it I've been very impressed. Image quality is excellent and can be fine-tuned to taste. Most useful feature for me is the ability to plug in two separate HDMI sources and switch between them when you need to. One moment I'll be using my PC and the next I can switch to my Mac without the need to unplug or plug in anything.
Bought this as an open box item but works just like new! The graphics are great and picture quality is great as well!
Love this large monitor.  Great price as well.  Why spend more?
I bought this for my gamer daughter and she loves it!
Monitor was easy to install and connect to a dual monitor arm. The price could not be beaten. The LG brand delivers great quality.

I bought this monitor to replace an old 20” 60Hz monitor by the same maker.
What difference 4 years can make.
This monitor is extremely light so fitting it it my multi monitor mount was no issue.
The definition, size and black balance has won me over.
I deduced a star because the pedestal is so basic that it only has tilt.
If it had an adjustable height pedestal I would have honestly given it 5 stars, even though the fact doesn’t apply to my current setup, I feel that other people will view it as a negative.
But having said all that, if you are going to put it on a mount, then it’s a great bang for your buck.

Our son wanted this for his dorm room so we got it for him for graduation. Not sure if he'll make it to a dorm in the Fall, but he has it set up in his room for now and he's very happy with it. Mostly uses it for gaming. He figured out a good sound setup - meets all his needs. What a great deal for this monitor - much more reasonable than many and seems to do what's needed!
For the price tag, it is defiantly a nice monitor. Nothing horribly fancy, but works well for my gaming pc.

I had to buy a monitor to be able to work from home due to covid19. This has been a good monitor so far. The base feels kind of cheap but the monitor itself appears to be typical LG quality. It’s very easy to switch off and on and even to switch to my personal laptop with a click of the button. Maybe that’s not at all unusual but it was for myself. Would definitely buy again and might buy a second one anyway.

The interface between my MacBook and the monitor is easy to plug-n-play.  The interface between me and the monitor is an understated one-finger toggle that is easy to understand and use.  Although the difference between the sharp Mac display and the LG display are easy to see, the accuracy of the LG is great for the price point of the monitor.
Nice display for a good cost friendly options.....

Includes HDMI and is a great value when on sale. I purchased it for 130 on sale and it is absolutely a great buy. However, at its original price of $200, you can buy a much higher quality monitor with features such as a rotatable monitor. Great value.

This is a really great monitor. I wanted a new second monitor and justified buying this since I started working at home and can also use in my off time.  It has a really great picture. I have not played any games that need really good graphics, so I can't comment on that. Stardew valley looks really good, though. I have had it a little over a month and had zero problems with it.
It's a good monitor for the money. I have it connected to my work laptop for 2 screen use and it works fine. Wish it was a little clearer and the colors more accurate, but it does the job.

We bought this monitor to go with a new laptop for occasional home use. Since COVID hit this has been a go-to monitor for work and was a great and timely purchase. Has the Speaker port. Nice graphics and a good size that fits perfect on the desk and comes in handy for those small fonts in work documents. Can not comment on any gaming as it has been primarily for work.
Needed a new gaming monitor that wouldnt break the bank. Perfect size for my desk, and the colors are CRISP

one_review_title: Great monitor for a great price!
one_review_text: Purchased this LG monitor to replace my old LG of many years.  I was quite impressed with this one right out of the box - essentially 'just plug and play' without any tweaking of controls, and at a great price.  It displays a clear sharp screen and vibrant colors.  I use my desktop mostly for keeping track of personal household and financial data, web browsing and a little game playing - nothing fancy. I'm quite satisfied with my choice.!
Purchased this monitor because it was a very good price for a VESA mount-capable monitor with dual HDMI connections.  It is also very lightweight.  Works well so far.
Good product for the price.  Easy to set up.  No issues.

Been using this for over a month now and am happy with the size and performance.  Use it primarily for work and can have multiple documents up at one time.  Pretty easy to set up once you realize there is a button at the bottom to change the input.  Wish the instructions were clearer about that.
Bought this for someone else and they loved it. Comes with HDMI cable. Easy hook up.
I am using this monitor with my Xbox One X & my PC. Works amazing for both uses. Amazing quality for my Xbox gaming (playing FPS). I can easily switch inputs to my Xbox or PC.
This is a great monitor for easy 60fps gaming and the IPS panel allows the colors to come through correctly.  I have been running this monitor at 75Hz and get great results when playing games.
Great size.  LOve the color and picture.  Works great and was a decent price.

Unpacked the monitor, connected the power and video cables, booted up pc, set resolution to what I like. and I was done..  At least for me there were no other adjustments needed..  Price was right, delivery was great.  Best Buy came through again. Thanks
It’s a great monitor to be playing Xbox on shows good graphics

GREAT MONITOR AWESOME SCRREN IMAGES CLEAR WEEL WORTH

I love this monitor. Picture is clear.

Great budget option for gaming. Very satisfied.

Great picture, easy hookup, basic cables included.
One of the best monitors for the money.  Easy to use and looks beautiful.  Highly Recommended!!!!

I purchased three of these monitors for my home office.  My wife took two of the three and she loves them.  Great picture quality.  The settings on the monitor are easy to adjust.  Easy to connect to stand or mount.

Got this for my kids to use they find it perfect for their needs and the games the enjoy to play. Would recommend it to those who want a good monitor to game on without having to drop a ton of money on.

Good picture and use as 2nd display, Bought in an emergency 
from a limited instore selection. No built in speaker HDMI out and
made in China make it a poorer choice.
great Price and easy hook up.  Needed a second one
Great quality for the price . Great big screen . Love how professional it looks . It’s perfect for my needs. The only con is there are no speakers. But other than that it’s perfect .

Been working from home since March 23rd. Bought this to use as a second monitor for all the apps I jump between. Bought on a whim as I needed another monitor and didn’t know what to expect. Easy set up. My only wish is that it could be a little taller. I had to put a sizable book underneath it.
Online learning picture is great it gives you to hdmi Incase you have to plug something else in got it on sale $129 great purchase
Purchased this one as a second monitor for my remote work. No issues. HDMI cable included adds to great deal. Easy to install and operate. Image is sharp, resolution is clear.  Highly recommended!

I bought this one to replace another LG 22” monitor that wouldn’t power up after being I use for 7 years.  The replacement was seamless and the unit had been performing well. My only regret is a lack of height adjustment.
I bought three of these monitors for our church when we started video streaming our services. The monitors are very crisp and clear and are a great product.

one_review_title: Great monitor at a great price!
one_review_text: This monitor is really good and not to mention the fact that it is extremely practical in my opinion. It has perfect color, resolution, and settings. The only thing I wish was different are the inputs. There is some clicking and pressing involved but it isn't something bad. Overall highly recommend this monitor to anyone.
The monitor was easy to connect and works great.  The picture is great and I use it mostly everyday.

one_review_title: Easy to Setup and Great View
one_review_text: Was super easy to setup. Don’t buy an HDMI cable as it already comes with one. Love the viewing angles. Windows 10, 2004, picked up the monitor right away without issue.

one_review_title: Great monitor if you have vision issues!
one_review_text: I wanted a monitor that was easy on my eyes and pocket. This LG monitor has fulfilled both concerns! I spend up to 12 hours or more daily viewing it and when I'm done my eyes don't hurt like with other monitors I've used. The price point was excellent! I have no regrets purchasing this monitor and would highly recommend buying it if you want something that is easy on your eyes.

one_review_title: Good Monitor for day to day work
one_review_text: Found this monitor to be good on eyes even for kids. There was no flicker and the IPS panel works fine. For the price, it was definitely worth.
I have a asus also. Think I like the asus more for gaming. Bought this for out of town so it will do.

Great monitor for the price. Only using it for work related applications, no gaming, so does what I need it to do without issues. One thing to note is that the plug is large so keep that in mind if you're squeezing it in to a tight power strip.
I purchased two for my wife's home office. My wife uses a 15" Lenovo laptop, and the two monitors work great with her computer. Lightweight, easy to set up, and sale price provided great value.
Needed a monitor work fun/work, this one does the trick and did not cost a fortune.

one_review_title: Good Monitor bought as a gift for a friend

works and looks good for an inexpensive monitor. Not a gamer anymore but the size is right for me. I played with the screen option and did a little tweaking.

one_review_title: Great Monitor at a great price

I use for work but it is great for movies as well.

I bought it with dell desktop. The quality is good for the price. Best for home and business

Nice replacement monitor and a sweet birthday present to myself. I my other six-year-old monitor was blinking like crazy and needed to go. I was looking for something that was sharp, bright, and had good color. This monitor fit the bill and the price was right.
Great price for a great monitor, perfect for use as a second monitor for laptop

I bought the LG-24" Monitor and just love it. Has a great response time and the picture quality is awesome. 

Highly Recommend this Monitor.

one_review_title: Great used monitor at an excellent price

I like it a lot. I have been using this for few months. clear picture and quick response
Bought this for my husband and he loves it! Good quality and sound.
At a great sale price this is the perfect monitor to work from home!

The price was good, too.  My friend has almost the same monitor (a little older model), and my friend is happy with the monitor, as well.

Very good image quality and excellent response time! Very light and easy to move around, if that is needed. Does not house speakers. That isn't meant as a knock, its just easy to miss that detail if you excitedly glance at the specs. Great value.
I HAD to get new, larger monitors and I looked around and chose two of these as a good value from a reliable manufacturer. Easy and versatile in the installation, they went right into my system.

The screen is large enough to open 2 views and the colors are bright.  Easy to put together.  Only issue was HDMI cable that came with it did not work, I had to write the co for a replacement, which I still haven't gotten. Still waiting from 3/12, its now 4/9.  Otherwise a guy buy!
nice resolution good for the price fits nice with stand
Great monitor for gaming, my son loves the size and functionality
Easy to hook up, works well. Using it as a second screen

great quality screen and would recommend it to others
very nice monitor very clear to see just the right size

Awesome product good prices and good service quality

Good size. A little nice than expected for an entry level price point.
Love the split screen feature. Easy to connect. Makes viewing document a breeze

Its great for my home office.  I realized after buying that It does not have a speaker or camera for video conferencing.  Not an issue for me.

The button, mouse combination is a bit wonky to work with but I am sure it is something to get used to.
Great monitor for the price. Great monitor for the price. Great monitor for the price.

For the amount I paid, it's exactly what I was expecting. Not going to blow anyone socks off, but will be perfect for everyday use (internet browsing, streaming internet video etc.) Good value for the price.
The monitor is very sturdy for a desktop.  It’s a pretty good size, and you get a decent picture on it.  Very good purchase.
Convenient size, brightness, and plug ins. This simple monitor holds everything. It has really nice blacks too.

Easy to install and works well once set up. I have no issue with the monitor at all. Only problem - the monitor has a dark spot on the right middle side of screen. Likely done during the actual shipping process but otherwise, fine.
It is a great monitor and the clarity is spectacular.

Purchased this for a workstation set up at the office and it does what it is supposed to do.

Great little starter monitor. Easy to use, easy setup and installation
Perfect monitor for working on from home! A trusted brand and descent price. I’m happy!

Great quality and sharp picture! Pleased with my purchase!

The only reason I'm  giving 4 stars is it doesn't  stay on long before shutting down into power-saver mode, which is a irritating when you are setting up and trying to connect to tour computer. Got these when trying to set up a dual monitor system as I developed my home office. The quality has been great, and got 2 of them when they were on sale. So far, no issues encountered.

Nice large monitor. I use it as a second screen for my laptop now that I work from home. Easy to set up and connect. Maybe the best part was that I bought it before Best Buy increased the price to almost $200.

I think mine came from a poorly produced batch, hence the 2/5 stars.

Physical appearance – I liked the slim design and how light it was.

Picture – While the contrast is typical, I found the colors to be off-pitch producing a more washed-out look. I did tinker with the contrast/brightness/color settings and it just wasn't up to snuff. The sharpness was fair, but then again, 1080P on a 24" display isn't going to yield crisp images.

Quirks – (1) After I plugged in my laptop to this LG monitor, I noticed the screen had flickering noise/scratches (like old cinematic projectors) - especially noticeable on blacks. (2) The other issue that bothered me more is that my panel, in particular, had inconsistency in the color temps. So I load up a couple websites with all white background and find that the left third of the LG panel is slightly warm (think soft white light bulbs) while the middle and right sides are normally cool (daylight light bulbs). This annoyance was what made me finally decide to have it returned.

My suggestion would be to look for another brand. Though buying this on sale and not being as picky with picture quality minus the flaws could be a good value, it's definitely not worth buying at $199.Read more

one_review_title: Could have been great but DAMAGED!
one_review_text:
I bought this item as a second monitor for mounting to WFH. The weight of the monitor was nice and light. It was very simply and easy to attach the monitor to the mount using the VESA wall mount attachments I have. The picture quality was good. 

It was exactly what I was looking for until I turned it on last night. 

I gave it 2 stars due to the damage, otherwise i would have given it 5 stars.

The problem is that half the picture on the screen keeps jumping every few seconds. And not matter what I do it is still doing it. I don't know if the product was made this way or if it was damaged in transport. 
At this point I will have to return it and get a refund. Due to the current situation with COVID-19, I how quickly I can return this to get my money back.Read more

one_review_title: No Linux version of OnScreen Control
one_review_text:
This is honestly a pretty nice monitor for the price, especially with dual inputs. Unfortunately I have to give it 1 star. 

The problem is, there is literally no way to adjust the brightness, contrast, colors, etc. unless you download LG's OnScreen Control app. Sadly, they only make said app for Windows and Mac, so if you're a Linux user, you are out of luck.

I'm sure this is an excellent monitor if you're on Windows or MacOS. LG really should have just allowed you to directly control color/brightness/contrast/etc. settings through the little joystick on the bottom of the monitor.

I'm returning this, and will make sure the next monitor I buy has built-in adjustment controls. 
It's a shame really, as I would have given this at least 4 stars if it was Linux-compatible!

I had been looking to add a second monitor to my work from home setup for a couple of weeks.  When I saw this on sale the price was perfect for what I needed.  I work in spreadsheets often and working off of a single monitor and laptop screen wasn't cutting it.  I needed more space to have everything laid out so I can see it all at once.  

The pros are that the lines on it are clean, the picture is sharp and the price was low.  It was easy to setup, with no additional software or configuration needed.

The cons would be that it's not fancy.  The stand doesn't adjust and you can't mount it on anything.  There are no speakers or USB ports.  It's got HDMI and VGA.  
This is for work so I won't be gaming or watching movies and that sort of thing on it.  For working on documents, emails, etc, this will fit the bill nicely.  If you are in need of a second monitor for work or school this should be perfectly adequate.Read more

one_review_title: Dell 23" IPS LED FHD Monitor, worth every penny
one_review_text:
This monitor is far from a top of the line gaming monitor and it does have some minor flaws and I will get to them. First I want to say that my choice is either 4 stars or 5 stars for the review, I could not give it the 4.5 stars I would actually like to rate it at. I purchased this monitor to hook up to my Alienware laptop when I'm actually working or gaming at my desk, I did not want to go "all in" on a monitor because most of the time I'm actually not using it at my desk. I will make this review as short and sweet as I can:

Pros:
* Picture quality
* Response time
* Small bezel (the bottom is larger than the top and sides)
* Overall stylish design
* Price
* True IPS panel
* Glossy screen for better clarity
* Low power consumption/heat output.

Cons:
* Some minor back light bleed-through noticeable when gaming in the dark along the bottom of the monitor - not noticeable when working in a normally lite room.
* Lack of more than 1 HDMI port - may be an issue for some
* A power brick similar to a laptop (this however is also probably why the monitor seems to run cooler than other monitors I have used in the past

Overall:
This is a great solid purchase for the price. If you are purchasing it for business use or for casual gaming you will not be disappointed with this monitor.Read more

one_review_title: Great monitors at a great price!
one_review_text:
I actually bought two of these right before COVID made my job mandatory work-from-home. My organization was trying a "test run" to make sure everyone had a good home setup and could log in to everything they needed to. Little did we know, a week later, the world is in quarantine.

Backstory aside, these monitors are high quality and are BRIGHT. I actually read that it's good to keep your monitors at a lower setting. I currently have these set at 63% and are still plenty bright and clear.

I'm running them through a JCreate dock so I can hook my laptop(s) up and have 2 monitors and my laptop screen. Driver install was super easy on Windows. Great purchase, great price, and would buy again!
Good monitor. But some times gives late response...

Bought this monitor for working from home. At the store it was one of the last one remaining. I saw the price and was a little hesitant, but decided it was what I was looking for in regards to size, color and style. I was completely blown away by the quality. It is super crisp and vibrant. It was easy to set up and does bring an HDMI connector to plug into your PC/Laptop. I would highly recommend this montior for it's style, size and quality.

The monitor seems to work fine, however, this is a low end Dell. There are no VESA mounts on the back to mount this monitor to an arm or to wall mount it. This was not immediately obvious until I got it home.
This monitor is good for an additional monitor not games.

This was the first laptop and second monitor I had purchased since 2013.  I typically had a second from work and access to tech help.  As a new retiree, I was on my own for this.  It was so easy and quick to set up.  Getting a second screen with a small laptop is the way to go.  This was easy and the screen is quite clear.

So I have a MacBook Pro and ever since I started working from home, I felt like I needed a bigger monitor, but didn't feel like buying a new computer or laptop. While searching for a monitor I came upon this and it is honestly the best purchase I have made in a long time. The picture quality is fantastic and the set up was super easy. This is a great monitor and I couldn't be happier. I don't do graphics so I can't vouch how good it works for that, but for regular office work, the price and value cannot be beat.

What's not to like? It performs perfectly, with great clarity and color.  Wiil it stand the test of time? Fingers crossed. Setup was easy.
I bought this monitor on February 26, 2019. Today is July 1, 2019 and it is not working. The monitor did not last 5 months. Will not buy Dell monitor again.
I needed it so I bought it, the quality of picture is great.

I got two of these monitors about 2 months ago and I'm still amazed every time I start up my computer. I was skeptical at first when it was suggested to me in the store but they turned out to be amazing. I kept the default settings because it's perfect. The base stand is very solid. If you are into video streaming, I suggest you buy this monitor.  My only complaint is that there are no inbuilt speakers. On the overall, it's perfect for the price.
great price for the size and clarity, i was very impressed.
The monitor is competitively priced, has excellent resolution for business and home office purposes and is easy to install and use.
very clear picture, perfect size, good value for price
Very easy to set up.  Good quality of picture.  I need this monitor to do teleworking from home.  It filled the purpose.

Small and hard to see. Not sturdy
Would not purchase again
Monitor as described, easy to set up, clear, bright screen.
Great monitor for the money. It’s got a really clear picture and the screen goes all the way to the edge.

Easy to set up with any laptop with an HDMI port.  Will bring a bright, clear mirror of your laptop screen.

Clear choice for a monitor.
Purchased for better set up for working from home. Perfect size and price for a quality brand. Highly recommend if one is on the fence.

Quick and easy installation.
Excellent screen quality for the cost.
Nice screen, color is great, size is great - price is great - definitely recommend! Hooked up easily
Great value for the money. Nice screen with good picture quality.
Excellent visual display and appearance in my office space at a great price.

Overall this a nice monitor although I do have one complaint. First, the positives. The IPS display is excellent and the color rendering is very good as well. The monitor was easy to set up and looks nice to boot. The only negative is that the screen can give off quite a glare and I frequently have to adjust the lighting to minimize the effect. Still, it is good overall and I would recommend.

The monitor is a great size for me and the screen has
a very nice picture. I have it hooked up to my computer 
so I can see on the big screen.
The screen is already going out and it has only been 3 weeks.

I love these 23 in. monitors. There is really no negative to these monitors. They have a great colorful display and the blacks are definitely BLACK. Other than that just a great monitor. So good, I bought two to put side by side. Only downfall may be that they do not have their own internal speakers - so if you do not have speakers for your computer, do not expect to hear anything if you just have these monitors. Great buy at a great price though.
Good size, good resolution and great price.  Easy setup.

Purchased this as a second monitor while I worked from home.  Works great - very simple to set up and comes with HDMI cord.  The great thing is - I also plan on using this as a streaming device in my living room where there is no cable. Nice price, well packaged.
Excellent monitor for a great price. Using display in well lit room, picture still good.

Great product and good value for your money. I bought 2 so I could use them for double screens when working from home. At first it's confusing to hook up but just make sure you buy the correct port. They work great, the screen is large and clear with great resolution.

one_review_title: Great monitor for size and price
one_review_text: Bought this for my sister and brother-in-law, they  only had an 18" square monitor, 23" Easy to set up and came with HDMI cable, They surf and do research online.

This monitor is perfect. I was looking for a good quality monitor that I did not need to spend $200+ for and I couldn’t have picked a better one. This monitor can only tilt up or down, it can not physically move up or down like some of the newer/more expensive monitors but I was ok with that. The picture quality is great and I had no problem hooking up the hdmi cable to my lap top. It is slim and has a sleek look. If you don’t mind the fact that the you don’t have the option to lower or heighten your entire screen as opposed to tilting, this monitor will work great.
Great product! Quick setup.  Screen is clear and large.

Like many others, have been working remotely with business issued laptop. I made it about four weeks until my eyes couldn’t take the small screen anymore! Shopped on Amazon first, but dismayed by the policy of having to ship back problem monitors at my expense! Figured if something went wrong with this one I could always return to store. I love that it is plug and play — just plugged it into my laptop and done.  Screen is clear my eyes are happy.  No audio on the monitor, but I just plugged in a speaker I had.  Works for both my MacBook and my pc laptop.  But note with the MacBook, it created a “two screen” environment, so you may need to drag things from your MacBook screen to this monitor to work on.

We purchases 2 of these for a dual monitor setup at work. The viewing and image quality is great and 23" seems to be an ideal size to setup dual monitors. Even if you wanted to just upgrade your old monitor this would do well for you. Dell always makes a good monitor as we have purchased many over the years with no issues.
Bought this to be a second screen for my work laptop. Install was easy and the screen looks great.

one_review_title: Nice balance of price and performance
one_review_text: Nice balance of price and performance! Bright, crisp image and super-simple set-up. This Dell gets the job done!

one_review_title: No wasted screen space and wonderful color
one_review_text: I picked this monitor out because it has  less than 1/8 inch rim on the sides and top so doesn't waste space. the bottom edge is 5/8 inch. The monitor stand is only 3/8 inch high and completely flat.  The monitor is easy to set up and comes with  all the cords needed.

one_review_title: Great resolution and great size for the price
one_review_text: I’d buy this monitor again in a second. I only use it as a second screen connected to my laptop. Price was just right for me. Not over the top expensive nor too cheap with poor quality. Fits that sweet spot right in the middle. Perfect for what I use it for. Nothing too fancy by means of features. Simple and easy to use.
I am older so the eyes are not what they use to be. I love being able to work on a screen where my eyes aren't on fire at the end of an 8 hour day from straining to see.

one_review_title: Great size monitor with bright graphic display
one_review_text: Needed a quick replacement to replace my old Dell system.  BB had in stock and bundled with the other components.  Love it!

one_review_title: Great monitor for home office during pandemic
one_review_text: The monitor has been a huge improvement to my WFH pandemic experience.  I am working off of an older Macbook Air and it was killing my eyes.  This monitor is bright, clear and has excellent resolution.  I thought at first that it would be too big, but it's perfect.  I sometimes use it as a single monitor and sometimes use dual screen with my laptop as the second screen.  The stand is modern, the bevel is slim and the price was very reasonable.
Great value for the money.  Good picture and appreciate the wide screen over my clunky old flat screen which was over 10 years old.  Easy to set up and no problems,
Great picture, easy set-up for dual screen, and very responsive

I purchased this to replace an older, 20-inch monitor/TV. What a difference! It's quite a bit larger and the images are so much sharper! My PC is set up in a very bright room and the screen doesn't get washed out at all!
This is a great monitor for the money. It’s much bigger than I thought it would be. The colors are really good, the picture is great and crisp

Easy hookup
Nice size
Good on the eyes
Was a great buy. Thank you
Nice picture, size for the money. would recommend this.

I purchased this for my daughter in college to use as a second monitor for her laptop, size is nice screen quality is good. I have purchased other Dell monitors in the past and have always had good luck with them.

Great deal! Real great image. My wife has issues with high refresh rate displays that are too bright and this one is a perfect fit for her. Plus, the display does not require special drivers to operate properly.

Needed a new monitor for awhile. Been shopping refurbished Dell monitors and they were way too expensive. Finally found this at a great price. It was worth the 99 DOLLARS crisp clean vibrant colors. Great size too. Buy one yourself.
Great quality picture and durability. Great knowledge about the product and great price also. Easy to hook up.
Picture is great and love this screen size.  Only had this a month but so far am well pleased with this product.
Beautiful picture over HDMI. I’m having trouble setting up the internal speakers but other than that the screens function perfectly.

The monitor is the perfect size and height to accompany my new HP laptop without cluttering my desk. I like the height of the stand so that I can store notes or pens underneath. Would definitely buy again at that steal of a price point!

one_review_title: Love the size and image quality!
one_review_text: I mainly bought this so that when I work from home I don’t have to look at my tiny 15 inch laptop screen and it did not disappoint.

I like the thin profile of this monitor. Mine is a little crooked on its stand, but I threw it together in about 5 minutes. I use it with a Dell laptop for working from home, it was a simple plug and play experience that required no set up. I can easily flip between dual monitor or duplicate mode and have no audio concerns. Cord length is good. Resolution and colors are great for spreadsheets, email and webinars.

one_review_title: Easy to connect for dual monitor setup.
one_review_text: Used for second monitor for dual monitor set up. Super easy. The picture is sharp and clear, so much so that I may get another to replace my older monitor. Highly recommend for the price.

one_review_title: Great monitor and easy set up!
one_review_text: Purchased monitor for basic computer needs and some gaming. Out of the box and up and running in less than 2 minutes. Great screen clarity and no motion blur when watching videos.
Easy set up, great price, I purchased two for my laptop makings working from home so much easier on the eyes.

My daughter is working at home due to the COVID-19 event. Her small laptop screen was causing eye strain, so it was time to get a monitor. This Dell fits perfectly on her small bedroom desk, interfaces well with her HP laptop, and the quality of the display is excellent. She is very satisfied with the monitor.

one_review_title: Great quality at a good price
one_review_text: This is the third Dell monitor I've purchased in the last 12 months. Great value and vivid display.

one_review_title: Easy to Connect to Computer and Stylish.
one_review_text: This Dell Monitor has a sleek, slim design and sits up tall on a pedestal making space on my work desk. Very easy to connect to our PC. Clear, crisp visual screen. Excellent Monitor for the price!

one_review_title: This size monitor is perfect for our new office.
one_review_text: The monitors are just the right size for our new office. They were easy to install and have a small footprint on the desktop. The colors are vivid and text easy to read.
The screen is a perfect size and is very easy to install and operate. I am very happy with my purchase.

I would wait for this item to go on sale, as it goes down to $110 every so often. There's a noticeable price difference between this and the 24 inch version ($30-$40), and the displays in store did show the colors being more vivid on the 24 inch version for each different display setting (movie, warm, cool, etc). However, I think the price different wasn't worth the extra bit of color on 1080p.

It was very easy to set up. I don't remember having to pull out a screwdriver, you just had to put things in the right places. VGA and HDMI compatible, and it comes with an HDMI cable. The stand is tilt adjustable only, which is standard for monitors in this price range. The design is pretty sleek, and the buttons come on the underside of the monitor.
We got this monitor on sale it was a great deal the picture is clear it’s the perfect size not too big not too small the resolution is awesome
I purchased this b/c I wanted to add an extra monitor to my computer. I wish had bought two of these while they were $99.00. It’s very clear and the perfect size for me.

one_review_title: This monitor was an excellent choice!
one_review_text: I purchased this monitor as additional screen to improve my home office.  Setup was extremely quick and it was up and running in less than 5 minutes.  The size is perfect for my desk and makes my work easier to view and organize.

one_review_title: I love the quality of the monitor

I also imagine they would glare with direct light shining on them.

The package arrived on time and received a notification by email to pick it up.

Can’t complain. Got this to have a second screen for my laptop during covid and it’s perfect. Happy it’s lightweight and the base is compact to fit on my temporary WFH desk. Resolution is great. Was very easy to just plug in and start working.

Cons, blacks are not that black and if you are watching a video on it with a dark scene you are left wanting more brightness. 

I guess there was something I could say I didn't like about this product.

Easy to set up and has adjustment buttons for fine-tuning.  Note:  The factory settings have been just fine, and I haven't needed to adjust the settings.  The picture is crisp and the unit looks great.  I'm definitely happy with this purchase.

I bought 2 of these when they were on sale to upgrade my home office set-up. I have been so happy with these monitors that I have recommended them to my co-workers. The picture is vibrant and crisp and the size is wonderful for working on Excel file. Highly highly recommend.

The monitor is bright and clear. It's just the right size for my small desk too. It isn't the latest model and needed a special adaptive connector for fit the display plug in my new computer. I ordered this extra part from another source. I wish it had been easier to find compatibility information on the site. (I ordered this online. It was the holiday season, and the store was insanely busy.)  It does work with the supplied HDMI cable, but would be better in the right slot.
Gamers and others who need the latest and brightest should pay a little more and move up. This one will suit my needs when the connector arrives.
This monitor is so clear.  Picture is great. Good price

one_review_text:
I use it with my DELL laptop as a second monitor. It's great. 
I only gave four stars, because 1) there is no camera. I have to look at my laptop camera to have an eye contact with my caller, when I want to be looking at the files on this big Monitor. I don't want to be looking away from the people, so, I disconnect this Monitor during my conference calls, which defeats half of the purpose. Because when you are having a conference call, sharing screen, that's when your laptop screen is too small, and you would want to be using a big Monitor.
2) You cannot use it vertically. I do a lot of editing. When I am editing, I would like to use my second Monitor vertically. But this does not have this feature.
But, overall, it's good to have as a second Monitor.

Cons.

one_review_title: Upgraded from 10 year old HP 23 inch
one_review_text:
I was concerned when I initially ordered this unit that full HD resolution on a 27 inch monitor may show a lot of pixelation. Thinking maybe I should have gone QHD or 4K?  But I was pleased to see that it looks great including one connection that is VGA which I was more concerned about. The other is HDMI and of course it looks great too.  This is being used primarily for office work. Some Recreational browsing too. 

 One thing about ordering a new monitor is to be sure it has the right connections. There are so many different configurations still being used for monitors. HDMI, DVI, display port, and VGA, so be sure you have what you need in the monitor. This unit has VGA and HDMI . One of each.  Also the cables you will require  and what you are connecting to are critical. This monitor comes with an HDMI cable but no VGA. So I needed to order one. 
You may need special cables too- like connecting a 3 year old Mac book Air which has no HDMI port requires a Mini DisplayPort to HDMI cable...but a similar year MacBook Pro has HDMI ...and a similar year HP elite-book has one HDMI but can also connect using VGA with the HP 2013 adapter - so there are umpteen variations you could need...depending on what the equipment you are connecting has for ports...hope this helpsRead more
I got this on sale for $159. For the price and size of the monitor I won’t complain. I would give a 5 star if Dell included an audio output, other than that it’s a nice gaming monitor.

I have been wanting to get some big monitors for work and finally pulled the trigger and got 2 of these.  The only regret I have is that I wish I would have bought them a lot sooner!!  I love my new set up!

This was a great buy, I was a little skeptic at first...I was looking for an iPad but a friend of mine convinced me otherwise. Honestly, one of my top 10 recent purchases. The resolution is fantastic and it makes a BIG difference than working from a laptop. I have it connected to my Mac in order to have dual screens. I now have a comfortable working space in my room - this has truly come in handy, specially since I am working from home. I strongly recommend this monitor - you will not regret it.

one_review_title: Works really well for our home office
one_review_text: Intended for a home office experience that would provide a great viewing experience. With a two monitor set up the screens perform seamlessly. I don’t use this for anything else then work from home so no gaming or moving viewing experience with these screens. That’s what TVs are for. Height is non adjustable only tilt. So if you are okay with that feel free to purchase these monitors. No screw drivers or tools required for stand to monitor set up.

I wanted to replace my wife's older LCD monitors since she's working from home and using them a lot now, which was causing a lot of eye strain.  I wanted to get her something bright and sharp, but looked good on her desk.  After a bit of research, I found these Dell's which met our needs perfectly.  They are much easier on the eyes both literally and figuratively.  You can adjust both height and swivel (including rotate), and they just look very modern with the thin bezels and angled stands.  The menu buttons are on the bottom right of the bezel and not labeled on the front so it takes a few seconds to remember what button does what but that's a minor thing.  Overall, very happy.  In fact, I purchased two more smaller versions for my own desktop!

This monitor is really working out great for me. I bought it just in time, not knowing I would be working from home for such an extended period of time.  It’s large enough that I can use it by itself or as as extended monitor.  The resolution on it is awesome as well.  If my desk space was bigger, I would love to buy another one and do away with using my laptop screen all together.

one_review_title: Dell - 27" IPS LED FHD FreeSync Monitor Review
one_review_text:
For the price, it's really hard to beat this monitor.  

I use this as my secondary monitor next to a color calibrated 32" Asus PB328Q.  I was able to get the colors on this Dell really close to the Asus, which is impressive.  

The blacks and whites on this Dell monitor are the only area where it is a little weak.  Black's aren't as dark and white's aren't as white, but for my purpose (tools/reference images) it's perfectly acceptable.

Be aware that here is ZERO adjustment to the stand.  No swivel or height adjustment.  To get it to the correct viewing height for my setup, I have it sitting on a 3" high box.  A little annoying but seriously, for the price, it's not a deal breaker.
Overall, I am extremely happy with the monitor.  I did a TON of research before buying and couldn't find a better price/performance ratio and so far, it has met all of my expectations.Read more

With the onset of COVID 19, work from has become increasingly popular and the need for a home office is greater than ever. Dell has definitely lived up to its name with this monitor. Packaging was good and box came undamaged and was delivered before time. 
Set-up was super easy and product comes with all the usual cable accessories (HDMI and power cables). 

Crisp images and decent resolution. Allows me to look at detailed protein structures and simulations quite lucidly.

one_review_title: Great monitor for general use and gaming
one_review_text: We needed a monitor for general office to video game use. The Dell 27" IPS LED FreeSync monitor has performed very well right out of the box.  Even with high definition video games, the monitor performs well.  The only noticeable difference between this monitor and a our high end gaming monitor is the black level and some minor streaking on fast moving objects.   Overall, great general purpose monitor that works well for almost all applications.

I have been forced to work from home off an older PC with a 21 inch screen.  My eyes were getting strained at the smaller display.  I upgraded to this baby and my eyes immediately felt normal again by the end of the day.  So far so good - much better!

Love the new 27' monitor, and these tired old eyes love it more. Moved the new screen further back on the desk and still see it well. Saves my back and neck. Even did a internet meeting with the wife and we both could sit back. Have used it for split screen for end of the month reports, no problem.

This Dell 27’ IPS LED FreeSync Monitor makes a nice secondary monitor, which is an absolute necessity when running multiple tabs at the same time. It’s so nice not to have to constantly flip between tabs when working and/or gaming.  A nice combination of visual real-estate and desktop space-saver.

I have purchased more than 10 of these for my office as we are currently working remote due to covid-19.  So far there have not been any complaints as this is a trusted brand.  It works well with PC's and Macs.  We are utilizing it mostly as a second monitor for macbooks and just needed to purchase an adapter to hook it up

Needed a monitor that is color-accurate for digital painting in Photoshop, so far this has been great. I have to keep max brightness while working but prefer it dim otherwise which means I'm constantly needing to adjust it, but rather than using the manual buttons on the monitor to adjust brightness (they're a bit difficult for me to press and not labelled) I just use a program called clickmonitorDDC

I purchased 4 of these to work from home and these have been much better than sitting in front of my 14” laptop screen trying to work. Picture is really clear and not too big where it takes up too much space. Happy with the purchase.

The only issue I had is that these are not VESA compliant. They do not have any holes in the back but found an piece on Amazon to take care of that.

I bought this monitor for normal use and was delighted with the overall performance. The screen size looks good for Eye. the response time is far better when compared with other competitors. Will definitely recommend for the normal usage.Just a reminder that this is not for gaming.

The 4 stars are for the monitors themselves and not the issue with having to buy adapters.Read more

Monitor was great until it started getting a dotted line from top to bottom. Switched to an old monitor to see if the issue would persist or determine if it was my graphics card. The dotted line disappeared with my old monitor. How do I go about using the warranty? Can I go through Best Buy?

This was a great value (for the price I paid). Good size. BUT, the build quality seems mediocre -- I can't figure out the VESA mount, so I had to leave it on the stand.  Oh the stand -- it seems so flimsy....and I can't wait for the joint to weaken so it won't stand up straight and will lean forward.  For now, it's fine.  Great value for the price.

I'm generally pleased with my monitor.  It's big - really big - and very clear and sharp.  It was easy to install and has been performing well.  The price and availability were good. It's a good basic monitor.  It only has two inputs: VGA and HDMI.  Fortunately, my video card has HDMI output so it was an easy connect with the provided cable. I'd recommend it.

one_review_title: Great second screen for price and value
one_review_text:
Purchased 4 monitors for office use.  They are clear, and great size with 27" vs 24"  

Very happy with the monitors dual screen purposes.

First thing, I thought the value for the price was excellent. I like the matt screen because there is less glare from light hitting it. My old screen had a glossy finish and when the evening sun came through the window and hit the monitor, it was hard to see. Not any more. Two things I wish it had but doesn't, are usb ports and speakers. I had to hook up external speakers and move my wireless mouse port   to the tower and take up a port there. I like the size and was limited to how large I could go in my space and this fits perfectly and allows me to split my screen while doing homework. Overall I am very satisfied with this purchase.
Went from a 20 year old smaller Dell that quietly passed away in the night. Easy setup and was shipped to the house the next day. Excellent price too.

one_review_title: Perfect monitor for home office use
one_review_text: Monitor has full HD (1080p) resolution and is easy on the eyes. Text is readable, colors are vibrant. I performed a dead pixel test online and thankfully there were no issues. I’d recommend that anyone who buys a monitor should perform a test for dead pixels. Monitor is good for gaming as well according to feedback from my son who uses it extensively. This monitor is great for its price point, if you want top of the line performance then obviously you will need to be willing to spend more. I’m happy with the performance of this monitor so far.
Great and priced reasonable great size and for easy to assemble

one_review_title: Would recommend this monitor to others.

easy to set up.  great color and size.  Easy to see everything on the big screen.

one_review_title: Very crisp monitor for an excellent price
one_review_text: Excellent display. Crisp, clear image quality. 27'' display easily allows for viewing two documents at once without switching back and forth, which makes working much easier and efficient. Also, great color! I'm sure watching a movie would be great on this display, but I haven't tried that yet. Oh, and great price!

this is a great monitor for the price, it's does the job for office or school use. Gets the job done, only draw is that it does not have an internal speaker. If you are planning on connecting it to a desktop or to your laptop, you should buy speaker. Other than that it's great, the screen is big and the colors are very vivid. I have it hooked up to my mac book and have not had any problems.

I was looking for a good, basic monitor for my home security system. I also wanted something that would connect to my laptop for videos when staying in a cabin I like to visit. This monitor works quite well for both. The picture is clear and crisp. I really like the maximum use of the face given the very thin frame. It's a very good value at the price.

It's hard to beat the value here. The only thing I would have like to have seen would be VESA mounting holes. Since there are none you'll be stuck with the stand it comes with (which isn't bad at all).

The picture on this IPS panel is beautiful.
Great colors, excellent value for the money.  I definitely highly recommend this monitor.

one_review_title: Easy to use and has an amazing quality!
one_review_text: Big screen and the color of images is great! I liked that was easy to install and didn't have any problems in time I connected it to my laptop. If you need a monitor for study or work from home, it will be an excellent choice!

Just got it a few hours ago and it's been great. Doesn't raise or lower, no VESA adapter on the back. But great picture for the size and price. One thing to note, by default, my display driver chose 60Hz and the picture was ok, but a little washed out with lines on quick scrolling. I noticed the specs say 75Hz, I updated the settings for the display driver and the display was MUCH better.

Since I'm working from Home now due to covid 19, I bought 2 of these puppies. I love them.  They were easy to put together and I wa sup and running on less than 15 mins.  The clarity is good and the color is vibrant.

one_review_title: Good Product, Shipment in Original Box a Concern

I had Best Buy do a price match for this product via the 1-800 # and they did the price match with no issues at all.  Shipment was also great....came in 2 days.  My only concern was that it came in the original box while though alright for protecting contents, not great when you consider porch pirates.

Great picture and quality product for a great price.  I use this for gaming and it blows the picture and detail out of the water on every TV I’ve played on at a price that is way less than I’ve ever spent!

My first Dell monitor to go with my new Dell laptop. Saw it on a Dell email and loved the sleek lines. Checked Best Buy and the price was right. Easy set-up, choice of angle positions for viewing. Sleep mode if you keep it on all the time. Love it.

one_review_title: Excellent, large monitor at a good price
one_review_text:
Clear, sharp, good color, easy-to-operate controls (it's truly shocking how badly designed some monitors' control menus are).

Set-up takes one minute.  The only drawbacks are that the monitor has only one HDMI port, requiring an HDMI switch for additional computers, and that the base does not have vertical-height adjustment.

But I am still quite happy with it.
bought this monitor for my boy's birthday to use with his computer for gaming and it is the perfect size and the picture is beautiful.  he is very happy with his new setup!

Working from a 15" laptop, analyzing and reviewing spreadsheets several times a week, can be taxing upon one's eyes. I purchased this 27" monitor to alleviate eye strain, headaches, and mistakes while reviewing important information. The setup was super easy, and it took minutes from the box to plug up. DEfinitely recommend.

one_review_title: Great monitor at a great price!

one_review_title: Large screen for a good price
one_review_text: Great value for a larger screen.  Comes with all of the cables you need as well.

I had difficulty getting an HDMI signal from my Lenovo Yoga 920 through the j5Create converter. I was using a 2-yr-old j5Create and it wouldn't pass HDMI. I got a new one and it worked, but to get it to work, turn off Lenovo and unplug everything. Then turn on Dell monitor and connect USB-C to Dell. Power up j5Create and you should have a picture on the monitor.
Great monitor but unable to mount on existing dual stand.  Great price on sale for this size.

one_review_title: Perfect First Time 2nd Monitor for Working at Home
one_review_text: Due to COVID-19 and my recent increase in workload, I decided to invest in a work-at-home work station. The first thing I researched was a second monitor, i.e., one laptop and one screen. I was debating in screen size (24" vs. 32"), and I'm thrilled I chose the 24". This monitor is a perfect size for my desk, and I believe 80% of everyday people will do fine with this size-- anything more significant would mean you are well aware and have the system to utilize all of that screen real estate. I'm a fan of the minimal and thin design, modern look with black and silver outline, and it has enough ports (HDMI & VGA) for a typical student and employee. It's bottom buttons, and menu settings are easy to navigate and feel, and the setup was straightforward. Oh, and the picture quality is impressive, especially for its price! I cannot stress how beautiful my YouTube 4k and other streaming services look on this monitor. I appreciate its blue light filter doing its job while maintaining excellent picture quality. I highly recommend this monitor for first time 2nd screen users, students, and employees who know they do not need a screen larger than 24".

one_review_title: Perfect for use as a second monitor
one_review_text: I bought this monitor for use as a second monitor for use with my HP Pavilion all-in-one pc. Exactly the same size and display quality as the Pavilion primary display, it matches perfectly. Comes with HDMI cable, even though I bought an extra one just in case it didn’t. Plug and play. My only complaint is that the height of the screen is fixed, not adjustable. This screen sits 1.5” lower than my Pavilion screen, the screens don’t line up. Easy fix, I propped it up with a couple pieces of 2x2 lumber.

I purchased 4 of these monitors for myself and my family members during a recent sale. These are IPS monitors and the display is very crisp compared to a non-IPS monitor(TN panel). They can support up to 75 Hz refresh rate but the default is 60 Hz. I use them for both office work and occasional gaming. Supports HDMI & VGA and comes with a HDMI cable in the box.

The only drawback with these monitors is that they are limited in movement ] and are not wall mountable( no VESA). They only tilt back and forth and cannot be raised or lowered. To mount them to the wall, they would require a separate VESA mount sold by 3rd party vendors on other eCommerce PRIME vendor websites for these kind of HP monitors.

This monitor enhanced my visual experience because the screen is clear and crisp. My eye fatigue problems continue to deteriorate but this monitor has made all of the difference. Install was a breeze and I definitely recommend this monitor.

I'm connecting to a MacBook pro and text is fuzzy on display. Has anyone else encountered this?? HP wants $50 to chat with customer service. "Image Scaling" is grayed out on the monitor settings. Any advice?

Bought one a few months ago & a 2nd one a month ago. Several different preset color options, as well as custom. I didn't think I needed a screen this big, but now I love it and there's no going back. Picture is very clear, I use this for playing video games, editing photos, watching netflix& working on spreadsheets. 
Viewing angle tilts up & down, base seems sturdy, comes with HDMI Cord.  I would buy this again. 


Only 2 Cons I found: 
  The height is not adjustable, but then I just got 2 of these $14 stands that actually make more room on my desk, so I cant complain. 
  These are not mountable with a different stand, there's no panel on the back, so if that's something you plan on doing it's not going to happen.

Picked up two of these bad boys 3 weeks ago. Couldn’t be happier. Got them when they were $70off so they were a steal. They look crisp, bezel is very thin and overall look is on the modern side. Only downside is that I need to purchase adapters to hang them on a desk mount. Otherwise great purchase.
HD for looking clearly and good to image , price accepted.

one_review_title: LOVE IT! Should’ve bought two of them!
one_review_text:
I got this on a daily deal, and wish I ordered two. I bought this for my WFH setup, and it is such a relief to my eyes from my tiny a** work laptop. 
Love how thin it is too as my desk setup is against a wall, and it pivots easily. The matte screen is amazing! Super geeked about this purchase! Thanks for the DAILY DEALS! Keep this in rotation for DD’s!
Liked the design. It’s sleek. Light weight. Easy to install. Works great with Mac. Speaker is missing nor provision for audio output. Anyways liked it.

This was purchased for Working from home. I was so impressed, I went back for a second monitor. Picture quality is great.

However... the down side is, there are no mounting. brackets on the backs of the monitors. The base however is very sturdy.

When I decided to replicate my two-monitor work setup at home, I looked for an HP monitor to match my HP Pavilion 24-inch All-in-One. I connected the HP-24f to the computer with the included short HDMI cable and the power cord to an outlet, set up the display in the fairly intuitive Settings/Display menu, and it's worked ever since. It's great to have so much working space!

I was tickled to get not one but TWO of these awesome monitors for my work from home set up. They are the perfect size, though I do wish they were adjustable. Screen resolution is nice and they are exceptionally thin and light! Caught them on sale too!!

I bought this for my fiancé as a second monitor for work which he’s doing from home during this time thankfully.  After careful review it seemed the best one for the price, capabilities and appearance.  This monitor is worth the money whether you utilize it as a regular monitor or computer, you won’t be disappointed.

one_review_title: Works great for a camera monitor!
one_review_text: Just upgraded my security DVR and cameras to HD and used this as a monitor. Has great image quality and the Photo setting is the best to use for playing footage. The bezels are small too.

While the display is large and clear, the construction of this monitor is terrible. It is designed to tilt forward or back and on day 3 of owning this monitor the display cracked when I went to tilt it. This isn't even worth the low-ish price. I was extremely disappointed and returned the product for a full refund which I put towards another Best Buy device.

Bought this monitor while on sale it is absolutely great! love this monitor. great value, great price, you can adjust it, change the brightness, contrast, night mode. I'm so happy with my purchase that i bought another one!

I bought 4 of these monitors to set up 2 dual-monitor work stations for working at home.  I edit documents, read email, participate in video conferences, etc.  I don't use these monitors for games or movies.  They're perfect for what I needed.

I got them on sale at BB for $109 ea.  They subsequently went on sale for $99 within the return period, so I asked BB for the price match.  BB has a strange policy that if you buy more than one of the same product in the same order, they will only price match one of the products.  In my case, I bought two of these monitors in one order and BB would only price match one of them?  What's up with that that policy BB?  It seems unfair to an average guy like me.  Anyway, lesson learned, if you buy more than one of the same product, buy each one in a separate transaction.
I like this very much I can say it’s value for money, light weight resolution is good

I absolutely live this monitor, I se everything crystal clear and the colors Are super vivid,
the only down side which I hadn’t notice before purchasing is that it has no speakers.

one_review_title: Initial steps for printer set up
one_review_text: The customer service that I received with the initial steps for my printer set us was very absolutely amazing. The Geek Squad representative took the time to answer all of my questions and went beyond to explain to me how to utilize my new printer through my WIFI with all my devices.  This was the first time that I had bought a printer like this and was very nervous about the utilization of it.  The customer service that I received put me at ease and helped me feel confident about using all of my devices with this printer.  I was very pleased with the attentiveness of the person who helped me as well as the customer service that I received. Life is very different during this COVID-19 times but I was able to receive the help that I needed.

one_review_title: This is really good for work
one_review_text: This is the second monitor I buy to have an extra screen to work from home, really good quality, light and thin.

I purchased this for use as a second monitor for my wife's iMac since she found herself doing a lot more video-conferences with the COVID-19 situation. It fits well with the whole Mac aesthetic and is super easy to connect with USB-C to HDMI. 

I think they only thing I'm not wild about (but that she could care less) is the non-glare screen. Compared to the high-resolution, high-gloss 4K display it sits next to, it appears quite a bit duller to my eyes. Color accuracy is fairly good and I was able to create a suitable profile for it. The near bezel-less design is sharp and makes for an overall small footprint! I'd love the ability to swivel it a bit as well...

For the price, it's a bargain!

Nothing bad to say, it works. Working from home because of COVID since March on a laptop. Finally bought a monitor, keyboard and mouse and it’s been so much better on my eyes, back, shoulders and arms. Shouldn’t have waited so long.

I did NOT have high hopes for this monitor. I figured I would slap down $99 and we would just have to deal with whatever kind of picture we got. OMG, I love this monitor, so pleasantly surprised... Its gorgeous, responsive, bright. I don't know all the tech terms, but it's awesome. You should totally buy this, and I'm always honest. You should see the negative reviews I do.....

I got this for my son to plug in via HDMI to his chromebook so he could do the Zoom thing and have a second screen open. He loves it and said it works great for gaming also. Very happy with the picture quality also.

one_review_title: My eyes are so happy about this purchase.
one_review_text: I have been working from home with a PC and a second monitor.  For what I do I need a lot of Real Estate.  My eyes were starting to bother me.  Problem solved by purchasing this monitor.  I looked at several brands but settled on this HP monitor.  Very glad I did.
This monitor is extremely great for games graphics. I use this duel attached to my Gaming laptop and they both have great graphics. I’d recommend this monitor to anyone I know that owns a computer.

Great image quality, size and swivel feature makes it easy to accommodate my home office.  Great for smaller desks.  The picture is very clear and versatile for work, browsing and watching movies or streaming services.

I made a mistake and did not read the details when I made this purchase. I needed a VESA mountable monitor. In the Q&A section someone had mentioned this supported VESA mounts, but I should have continued to read the product details and other Q&A responses more closely. I returned the product because it does not support VESA mounts. However, it is a great product if you need a monitor with included stand and don't need VESA compatibility.

Perfect-match up for my HP Pavilion! A little-bit light in weight for it's size, but this is both good AND bad. By that, I mean it's good in the fact that it's quite-compact for it's size-range--but kinda prone to sliding on a polished desk top, with an accidental-bump, mostly due to the lightweight "foot", of the stand.

But with it's video-quality? I can live with that little-glitch...!

Bought this small TV for our kids to watch their shows. This TV has Hulu, Netflix and extra channels on it. Our kids can watch their cartoons and tv shows and it is a perfect size. The picture is very clear and has many options for channels.

one_review_title: Great monitor at a low price

Get price, great quality, so if you do t want to spend a few thousand dollars just yet for an iMac this the way to go..

Working remote I needed two inexpensive monitors to do graphic design and eLearning work.  I bought these as throw away monitors.  To my surprise these are great monitors.  Black are black, colors pop.  The bezel is so small that placing two side by side its almost like one continuous screen.  The only downside I see is there is no vesa mount, and the stand is now vertically adjustable.  You can tilt the monitors forward and backwards.

I miss my extra monitors which were left back at the office.  This monitor is a great size and was easy to set up.  I also find it lightweight enough to pack up and take with me when working at another location.

Being an older person, I wanted a larger monitor to replace my old smaller monitor. I also wanted it where the glare would not be pronounced. This monitor has met both of those requirements. It also has clear sharp picture which I also like.

one_review_title: Didn't match well to a MacBook.

The problem remained, so rightly or wrongly I concluded that the issue was between the monitor and the computer. I liked the monitor, but had no alternative but to return it. The purchase of the monitor and its return to BestBuy were both good experiences. I gave the product 4 stars for its quality despite the fact that there was a mismatch between products.

one_review_title: Does What I Need It To - Good Value
one_review_text: I bought this for work. I often am working simultaneously on multiple documents and my work laptop has a small screen. Also, I sometimes host webinars, so having the extended display lets me put things I don't want to show when I share my screen to one side. I like the size of the monitor (but I have good close-up vision) and the picture is clear, but I haven't taken the time to learn any of the controls yet. The one thing (and maybe this is something I can configure) that has been problematic is that I cannot hear any Microsoft system generated notifications, like calendar reminders and incoming Skype IMs. The audio and laptop mic work fine for Zoom, though.

The flashing line has been appearing since the first time I used monitor. Due to short return window, was unable to return.
