Nice monitor takes up little space on desk, nice and modern looking.

one_review_title: Would not turn on, right out of the box
one_review_text: Package arrived today, I was looking forward to using for work due to the stay at home requirements (and the occasional gaming). Clearly the power supply or the monitor itself were bad; I could not get the monitor to turn on or show a green light. Checked the connections multiple times, and even called HP support. I will never, ever buy an HP monitor again. Returned and purchased LG 24” like I should have in the first place.
It is a nice basic monitor at a good value.  Note that it is speaker-less.

Easy to setup screen that provides a beautiful picture. The minimal bezels are great and give it a nice modern touch. Also very lightweight when. We you are trying to clean off your desk or moving it around.
Buttons are under frame with no marking to show what they are or were they are.
No bells or whistles with the monitor, great price.

one_review_title: Good monitor- use it for my home security system
one_review_text: Good monitor- use it for my home security system. Very pleased

Bought two of these on May 15, 2020.   On July 15th, one of the monitors video components died (grey stripes).   Signed into account and leaned that June 15th was deadline to return.   HP site does not appear to recognize problems for model numbers on these external monitors.  Didn't spend a whole lot but won't be buy-in another HP monitor.

one_review_title: Beware of plastic connector on stand
one_review_text: While the overall monitor is ok, the stand connects using a plastic piece that comes out of the back of the monitor.  That connection is used for the tilt function.  If it breaks off (which is highly likely), you will have no way to use the monitor.  The 1-year warranty period is insufficient to deal with what I would call a design defect.
Great picture. Easy setup. Excellent price. Highly recommend.
Purchased this so far no problems seems to work just fine.
The build quality was very poor, and a week after having it the ports started having issues, and then It kept shutting off and now it won't turn back on. Really upset about this product.
I have a BenQ GW2480 and in comparison to this HP monitor, it has a way better screen quality. I set them up right next to each other and BenQ won the game. They’re in the same price range.
It would nice if it was able to go up and down. It is too low.
The color isn’t half as vibrant as it was in the store.
Worked for a week attached to my computer. Screen suddenly went black and hasn’t worked since. Tried every different type of connection and still nothing.
This monitor is extremely light weight and good quality, the only thing I didn't like is the color, its extremely distracting.
easy to connect - not much features but enough for standard

Got this monitor to help me work from home and I love it! Nice screen resolution and I love the sleek look of it! I primarily use it to have extra screen space for basic office work. I haven't used it yet to edit any photos or graphics (I don't do a lot of that anyways), so I don't know how those will look yet. However, from what I see from papers I look at on it (that do have fluorescent microscopy images) it looks pretty good with that. I really like this monitor and it will greatly help me work from home more now.

one_review_title: The monitor started flickering within a week
one_review_text: The monitor started flickering within a week of the purchase. I reconnected it to a different processor and HDMI cable to confirm it.

one_review_title: No longer works after only a few months
one_review_text:
Bought this monitor for my work from home office.
After only a few months of intermittent use the screen blanks out several times a day. The power light stays on so power is not the problem. It is basically useless.

I bought this monitor as an open-box item and got a great price on it. The colors are very vivid and bright. I love the size, as it is just perfect for my at home desk. I did not want anything too large, because my desk is small. I have not had any issues with the monitor other than it was very difficult to set it up initially. The monitor looks expensive, meets my needs and I don't have any complaints.
This would be a great monitor but won't go into sleep mode so we have to remember to turn it off each time. Geek Squad was no help so far.

one_review_title: Great Monitor with Excellent picture Quality!!!!
one_review_text: Love this monitor. It's lightweight with a very sleek design, but the best part of the monitor is the Picture Quality. I would recommend this to anyone looking to update and take their viewing experience to the next level. I was able to see an immediate difference from my old monitor. Crisp display of documents and exceptionally displays all types of videos.

I have two of these monitors and they were perfect for my home office. I bought a third for my son, plugged it in and saw a thin, red vertical line down the screen. I returned ot to BB without incident.

I got two of these monitors for my home office set up. These work really great. Screen is clear, don’t see glares when the sun hits the office. I love the adjustability of them. Sad they couldn’t be mounted but wasn’t a deal breaker for me. Overall great for the price. Very pleased

There are so many different options out there for monitors it is hard to decide which one to buy. I bought this to match the new computer brand and it was very easy to hook up and has a great picture. Good monitor for the price range too. Anything under $200 is pretty good right?
Monitor stopped working about 1 1/2 months after purchase. Past return date. Would never buy again.

For some reason the keyboard HP provides has the F1-F10 keys locked on the secondary function mode and there is no way to change it other than buying a different keyboard.  If you are an AutoCAD or Excel user, the keyboard is all but useless and you will have to fork over more money to buy a different one.  HP's technical support is useless on the topic - they keep telling you to change the BIOS setting but there is no ActionKey function setting in the BIOS.  Would encourage buyers to look elsewhere.

one_review_title: You get what you pay for
one_review_text: The picture has a grainy look to it but is expected at the price
I thought I would love this monitor but it's lack in support for an arm was a deterrent.  The quality was not there.

one_review_title: Great monitor for working from home!
one_review_text: Have had this monitor for a little over a month and it does the job I wanted it to: act as a second screen to my laptop to make working from home easier. Easy setup with a simple HDMI cord (which was included) - note the monitor does not have speakers, but that wasn’t important to me. Overall I am completely satisfied with this purchase! Great picture quality for reading documents, forms, etc.

For $109, this monitor great. The design looks nice. The picture quality looks very good. I didn't do any thorough testing. I don't have the means to test freesync, so I can't comment on that.

The only issue I have is there is no tilt mechanism. So if you're OCD about things not being straight, you will want to get a monitor that has a tilt function.

one_review_title: Doesn’t even allow my son to download fortnite
one_review_text: Really want to get rid of this. I told the guy at the store my son wanted this to play fortnite on. We get home he sets it up after opening it xmas morning & while it works he can’t download fortnite. Waste of my money
good performance for the price. sleek design. great as a main screen or second monitor
This is a really clear and beautiful screen. It is light and easy to put together!  I absolutely love it!!
I absolutely love this monitor. It was easy to set up. The picture shown is nothing like it looks in person. It has a beautiful screen. I would definately recommend buying one of these.
I wasn't sure when I purchased this monitor that it was going to work for me. But as soon as it came on the color and beautiful display changed my mind quickly. I am so glad that I bought this one.
Nice display and value. Sleek design and easy setup

This 24" HP monitor is great for the price. Picked it up at Best Buy for $150. Clear screen images, perfect size for a desk, easy installation to your laptop, sturdy base. Overall, excellent product. I would buy again. Cheers.

one_review_title: HP - 24f 23.8" IPS LED FHD FreeSync Monitor
one_review_text: HP - 24f 23.8" IPS LED FHD FreeSync Monitor - Natural Silver is beautiful 2k monitor. AMD freesync technology so gaming if used will work better than a G sync type. This will work dual setup on HP envy x360 ed00..dx if using hdmi & hdmi to usb-c. Or usb to dock with displaylink technology. Low power consumption so energystar rated. Overall for price these are just as nice if not better than dell ultrasharp monitor.

I need to improve my Zoom skills. I purchased this beautiful monitor to enlarge my laptop screen. Best decision this year. It’s clear and easy on the eyes. It was easy on the budget as the sale price that weekend was terrific!   Do not hesitate to pick up this monitor for your home or office.
It's a great product wish it came with a remote control

This monitor's precisely what I'd been searching for. It has a sleek design, the screen size is ample, the base does not take up too much desk space, easy to install AND it was very affordable. It looks gorgeous in my simple, modern home office and most importantly, I no longer need to squint to work on reports! Highly recommend.

one_review_title: Your return policy is not user friendly
one_review_text: I feel that giving a person only 15 days to return an item is unrealistic .

one_review_title: Very nice product for the price
one_review_text:
with pandemic going on this is the best screen I could ever found for this price 
the display is really good and works best with low blue screen option as well

the setup is easy and there is no tool or anything required 
up and running in less than 5 minutes
I purchased this to be a dual monitor for my Apple iMac screen. The colors match and it was easy to connect. The screen colors are bright and clear. Sometimes it looks better than the iMac!
Could not get  wireless keyboard to  sync to docking station. I option for a wired keyboard and will be returning the product.

I was looking for an inexpensive monitor to replace an 8 year old monitor I had that finally quit working correctly.  I looked at a number of different monitors and this one seemed to meet my needs the best at a great price.  Installation and setup were easy and it works extremely well.  The monitor is clear and easy to view for all of the office functions I use it for (videos, WebEx sessions, spreadsheets, powerpoint presentations, email) and seems to be up to every task I've thrown at it.

one_review_title: It does not work-taking it back
one_review_text: This did not come with the correct cable to connect to the computer(blue on computer). It is useless until I (apparently) purchase the connection cable. It would have been nice if the salesman would have let me know that so I didn’t have to make another trip back. This is the 2nd time something like this has happened. I bought a computer with insufficient portals & had to buy an adapter. Please disclose this at purchase. Very disappointing- I will look for a more reliable place to shop. The price isn’t that good if you have to buy additional pieces for it to work properly?!!
Beautiful quality picture, super easy to set up. Easy HDMI plug in. Fast response time.

one_review_title: Nice standard monitor to buy in 2019
one_review_text:
To me, the original 1080p HD resolution is still good enough for most of this things I do with my 2018 macbook pro. Perfect picture, excellent brightness, and good looking. Another positive thing to note about this HP monitor is that you don't need to connect a bulky power cord straight to the monitor. Instead, the monitor comes with an adapter from which to the monitor you run a much thinner cord so you can hide the bulky part of the power cabling under the desk.

I believe Best Buy set the price to the reasonable level ($109.99) in today's standard; I wouldn't buy this monitor at the MSRP. It's 2019, not 2009.

My laptop screen died, but everything else was working fine. During the pandemic most everything reasonably priced at Best Buy was out of stock, including new computers. Geek Squad offered me the solution to hook up to a monitor and I found this returned item that was the only available monitor under $350. So glad I did! It’s a huge screen with excellent resolution and color. Would highly recommend.
This is a must buy monitor to extend the display Of your laptop. Screen size is absolutely perfect for WHF model. Picture quality is impressive and very easy to setup. Reduces eye strain.

If you aren't someone who needs high hz for gaming or UHD for some professional reason, this is a high quality monitor for the money.  The ips display is bright and clear from any angle.  Plus it has freesync for the light gaming I do.  Great purchase but try to get it in sale!
This is a great monitor at a very reasonable price. Easy to set up , good color and I  particularly like the  IPS, almost borderless display, saving lots of space compare to the regular monitor.

one_review_title: Great monitor for space challenged folks
one_review_text: I have this same monitor but in the 27" version. My desk ended up being too small to mount an additional 27" so I settled for this 23.8" and I am not disappointed. Beautiful and clean finish. Clear and bright screen.
Easy set up. Lightweight and clear display. Extra monitor for work purposes. Great deal of the day. Recommended.

This HP monitor is just what I needed. Text and graphics are very clear, colors are great, and I can use it for hours with no eye strain. Not only that, it’s sharp looking and easy to assemble. Highly recommend.

Are you looking for a monitor for gaming as well as general productivity? Keep looking. Do you do color-specific work, such as publication layout or graphic design? Keep looking. Do you need an inexpensive monitor to work from home or just general use? Then look no further!

I purchased this monitor to hook up to my laptop to work from home, after getting by on the laptop's 13" screen for 6 months. Oh why did I wait so long? 24" seems to be the sweet spot for general productivity. I can have two Word documents open side-by-side, or Chrome and Adobe Reader, or...well, you get the point. It's just so much better than working on a laptop screen. The IPS screen provides good color and brightness, and the thin bezel and silver finish go well with my HP Spectre x360. It does come with an HDMI cable, although for use with a laptop you will most likely need a converter.

The only negative I can think of is the lack of height adjustment, although the ability to tilt the screen somewhat offsets this. Overall, I'm extremely happy. This is a great, general use monitor for the price.

one_review_title: Great monitor and a reasonable price..
one_review_text: We bought this monitor on a budget hoping for a decent size at a reasonable price. It has good graphics and is sleek and light weight. Very happy with this purchase.

I already had the 25" monitor which was no longer available. I wanted my monitors to match (my OCD). I opted for the 24" which are identical and it really take a long view to see the difference in size.  Clean, clear, and beautiful graphics on this display. I would purchase again if I needed.

I like the 'almost'edge to edge screen. It is really easy on the eyes and for a smaller work space, it was a great improvement to size up from a 19" screen. Great price. Arrived on time and easy to set up. It was a great purchase.

one_review_title: We're very happy with this HP monitor
one_review_text: The monitor's display is excellent.  The setup instructions were clear and efficient.  It has simple, efficient base that works really well.  It was easily well worth the money spent.
Brought this for second monitor working from home. Setup was easy it has a great screen view. Affordable price
Monitor is sleek and has great display. Was easy to install.
Bought a pair of these for setting up a work-from-home environment. Good price for a matched pair of monitors. Nice crisp image, straight-forward setup. Just what I was looking for.

I just bought this amazing monitor which was on sale, I really like this screen, stylish design, very sleek.  Picture quality is clear & crisp.

I really liked it:)
This monitor is lightweight and very clear and bright for cost. Setup was easy as well.

one_review_title: Great product at a great price
one_review_text: I love the sleek design and image quality. Monitor was easy to sep up and the promotional price made the purchase a no-brainer

This monitor is perfect for work-from-home or virtual learning.  the bezels are small along the top and sides and the base does not take up a lot of space.  It's the right size if you would like to purchase a 2nd monitor for dual monitors. 

This is not a 5k monitor like the very high end monitors that are expensive.  This is not what you are getting.  What you get is a quality display for a good price that simply allows you to have more screen real estate instead of using your Chromebook or laptop screen.  

This also not VESA compatible, so this is basically to be stood up on the tabletop and not mounted to monitor mounting arms.

In summary, this is the perfect affordable, but good quality home monitor for someone who does not need a really high resolution (4k or 5k) screen and color technology.

one_review_title: very clear and sharp images for the price
one_review_text: the monitor was easy to plug in, and it has very clear and sharp images.  I use it primarily for office work and it's easy on the eyes for word processing etc.  I like the (almost) edge to edge screen, and it looks kind of sleek on my desk.
Super clear picture, good price, good quality , IPS screen

one_review_title: Great monitor and easy to set up!

This is a great monitor at a reasonable price!  I’m not very techy, and set this up in 2 minutes.  Super easy!

Nice big screen so easily able to see everything from spreadsheets to emails!  Very clear.

I needed a monitor for work. This ended up being the perfect purchase the size the clarity of the screen and not to mention easy set up. Everything I needed (including hdmi cord) was in the box. I would recommend this product

one_review_title: Bright and clear screen; paired well with computer
one_review_text: Setting up screen with new computer was a breeze. Screen is good size and has crisp image.
It was very easy to wire (simple electrical plug and HDMI port). Display is very clear with stock settings. Excellent quality for cost.
Works great and produces a nice image! I use it for a second monitor and for my PS4. No weird display lag or anything. Definitely worth the price.
Beautiful picture, was very easy to set up and very good quality.
great monitor for price, has dual inputs for VGA and HDMi that I find handy

Great price for such a nice display! 
Yes its only 1080p but I use it to edit 4k footage so it's nice and crisp!
great clarity, excellent value for the price, ease to install

Great price, easy to hookup, the picture is great. I plan purchase another
Excellent monitor using for a second display super clear and works well and fits perfectly into space allocated for this setup
Screen is perfect size for a small home office setup. Screen to body ratio is very good and has a sleek look.
Crisp and clear.  The color is vibrant.  Easy to set up and very light weight.
Easy to hook up and the display is beautiful. I bought two and placed them side by side.

one_review_title: a great scree for the price
one_review_text: excellent modern display for office or home use.  easy to plug and play.
Got 2 of these for an office dual screen set up, looks and works awesome!
Great middle screen for my two curved monitors. Bright, HD quality and affordable.
Great picture quality. The only draw back, it does not have speakers and I did not check before purchasing. Other than that, no complaints.
Sleek, perfect size,  needed dual monitor set up for WFH. Great price.
nice clean looking screen, very clear picture and didn't have to wait to long for delivery

I purchased this during a sales promotion and I am glad I did. The display quality and build is very pleasing. Although, it would be nice if there was a a mechanism to raise or lower the monitor, it is a minor quibble considering the great price. Otherwise, this was a great deal for everyday monitor use. Recommended!
Extremely nice display for the price.  You can't go wrong.

one_review_title: Nice monitor at a great price.
one_review_text: Large view screen due to the thin bezel. Screen is bright and has good contrast for text and graphics. This monitor has HDMI and VGA connection only. The monitor tends to flicker on some websites visited. Don’t know if it’s caused by the monitor sync or website. All-in-all a good monitor for the price.
Screen clarity is great, easy to install with provided cables. Worth the money!!
Monitor is sleek and has great display. Price was good for what you get.
It’s not the biggest monitor but the picture is good. Text viewable and video looks good. Great for the price

one_review_title: Really good monitor for a great value!
one_review_text: Sleek, easy set-up, and it looks great! I bought two of these to use with my MBP 13", and I love it. Great resolution, looks almost like my laptop screen.
What a great purchase, great picture and color. Easy to set up and for what I paid a great price.  Very happy with my purchase.

I finally decided to order a new monitor after realizing I’ll probably be working from home due to Covid for much longer than expected. This monitor is a really great price for the quality. The monitor has amazing resolution and a nice small footprint on my home desk space—it’s very pretty and does the job of giving me two screens for my laptop which makes my job much faster and easier. 

Also very impressed with the quality and care of Best Buy curbside pickup during this crazy time. I was able to order on my lunch (and it was ready for pickup within 5 mins!) and I was able to quickly pick it up (ID required for pickup, so good security for a prepaid order). 

Overall a really good deal!

Picked up this monitor at my local Best Buy location for my PC build. I am not really that into gaming so I didn't want to spend a ton on a monitor. However, I do some basic degree of media editing, so I wanted the best monitor for under $200 I could find. All in all, this is a great monitor for the price. The colors are very accurate and the matte panel is a nice touch. Also, I'm a big fan of tiny bezels, so that was nice to see as well. My only complaint is that the connectivity options consist of HDMI and....VGA? In today's world of HDMI, DisplayPort, USB-C, etc., I don't see many people having use for a VGA in. I understand that at this price point you won't get many connectivity options, but I would have liked to see maybe HDMI and DisplayPort if limited to two options. Overall though, great buy and I'm considering buying another to run a dual monitor setup!

I bought this two weeks ago and so far, no complaints.  This monitor has great picture quality that I might buy a second monitor in the near future.  Easy setup with easy instructions.  

I tried elevating the stand to meet my eye level but it went back down to its original height unless I don't know what I'm doing to where it stays put lol but this doesn't bother me at all as I've only fiddled with the stand literally once. 

Overall: I LOVE THIS MONITOR
I bought this recently to work from home.  Great display. Easy set up. Great price. Nice job with delivery by Best Buy.

HD content freezes screen at continuous intervals  with best settings turned on. Very annoying.
Not sure If I can replace it now since it is already 3 months.
This is a great screen, especially for the price we paid.  Colors are fantastic and screen clarity is just what we wanted Highly recommended !

This is great buy.  Very sleek looking monitor.
Plug and play in minutes.   Picture is vivid and just the right size for my desktop.  
Need another to display my PDF music files using the VGA out from my tablet.
Great screen quality. Nice, sleek, design. Easy to assemble.
Great images, very sleek and sturdy.  Great price and free shipping.
I bought this monitor to connect to my laptop, it has hdmi connection and the image is clear and smooth. It has to put on correct resolution. easily setup and reasonable price.
Great clarity, all you need is HDMI which is included. Great size screen. Great deal for the price.

Setup with no issues, design was very appealing and well balanced. A HDMI was included, which is a nice extra not to buy. 

After setup, the screen looked very nice and brightness had ample range.
Purchased this monitor for my office,  it was easy installation.  The picture is clear. Great value for the money.
Very pleased with set up, picture quality and sleek appearance!
A very good product and worth money. I wish it also has speaker attached. otherwise, a good screen.

one_review_title: I love it, screen not to big and not small.
one_review_text: Easy to set up and I love my new Monitor. It's not to be for my desk and not to small that I have had time seeing things. And the price was just right for me.

The screen and base are as expected as nicely designed. The joint the puts the two together is plastic and has a give making the screen susceptable to slight wobbling. The viewing angle cannot be adjusted which is in the product description, but the screen tilts slightly forward, I think because of the less than perfect joint design. When I attach my webcam or shift the position of the screen I try to take care so as to not stress the joint. Fine for my purpose and for the price.
This monitor is lightweight, sleek, and has a great picture for the price. If your in search of an affordable monitor, this is a great option to consider

one_review_title: HP - 24f 23.8" IPS LED FHD FreeSync Monitor - Nat
one_review_text: This screen is great for everyday use. Clear picture. Easy to set up only need HDMI cable do no monitor cord as with older models. Love the small amount the stand takes up. Great for uding as dul screen.

I originally purchased one of these monitors for personal use last year and brought it to work one week when I was working at our secondary location and needed a larger screen than my laptop had. My team loved them so much that we have purchased 3 more since then. They are crisp, easy to set up and navigate, are holding up well after 10 months of almost daily use. I would highly recommend these monitors.
Easy to view text and picture. I am able to  move it  around with ease. A photo I took  looks good on it as a screen saver too. It is the best monitor I've had and the price was reasonable.

I bought this when it was on sale for $100.  A brand-name 24" monitor for $100 is a good deal.  The picture is great.  It supports both HDMI and VGA.  It would be nice if there was another HDMI input, but you would probably pay a lot more for that extra feature.  My video card recognized it as FreeSync, which is a plus.  When I was forced to work from home, I could see details on this monitor that I hadn't seen on my work monitors.

Another "complaint" is HP supposedly has a speaker bar that can be attached to monitors.  But they have different models of speaker bars, and so far, I haven't found anything that says "use this speaker bar for that monitor".  But I'd still give it 5 stars.
Perfect size for my needs. The screen resolution is very good. It a easy to hook up to my computer and 1st my Monitor.

one_review_title: Great monitor for the price!! Best buy deals rock!
one_review_text:
The silver color looks amazing!!
Only issue is speakers not there is this and it would be good to have a 3.5 mm jack for some users maybe!!!
Totally recommend the product!! The screen resolution is amazing!!
Hp is durable and reliable!!

one_review_title: Easy to set up.  Good picture quality.
one_review_text: Easy set up from right out of box.  Good quality monitor with crisp display.

Very happy with this monitor so far!  Looks modern and sleek.  Picture is very nice.  Starts up quickly if I step away from computer.  No camera but that is what I wanted.  Good quality at a very reasonable price.
Overall very beautiful display very thin monitor setup was easy great product

Purchased to use as a second monitor with my Dell laptop. Easy setup with no issues. Just plug in the hdmi cable to both and your good to go. I use just for word processing and emails but this monitor has crisp images which are easy on the eyes. Very little glare. Thought about a larger screen but this is plenty big on my desk.

Purchased this during the 4th of July Sale as a second monitor to work remotely from home.  Setup was a breeze.  The monitor bigger than I expected and the perfect size for an additional screen.  It came with a HDMI cord I was easily able to plug into my laptop with no additional cords needed to be purchased.  The picture quality is phenomenal!  Best purchase I've made for $100.

Purchased for business. Intent was to provide a wide range of work space when working with multiple softwares. The Salesman was awesome. Listened to my needs and put together a great work station setup. Within my desired budget. 
Very happy with my product.
Good Monitor especially for price. Clear display and easy to hook up.

Who would think that a couple of extra inches would go so far!
I am coming from a 22 inch screen and did not expect such of a difference in screen size but it was quite noticeable.
The picture is really clear from all angles as well, really happy with my purchase and I got it on sale as well!

one_review_title: HP24f 23.8 LED Monitor-Silver provides good value!
one_review_text: This is a good solid monitor for the price. Easy to hook up & has a VGA, old style, hook up as an option in the back of it. I switched from an LCD, HP, monitor which was 10 plus years old. This LED is clear however letters have a minuscule amount of shadow as compared to an LCD view.  The advantage is ergonomic as this LED Monitor runs 90% cooler, on less energy as LED's do. Colors are true. Good bang for the buck! I think I might have opted for the 27 inch if cost wasn't an issue for me currently.

one_review_title: Great addition to my home office!
one_review_text: I've had one external monitor for a while and used it whenever I needed to work from home. Since COVID-19 hit, I've had to work from home everyday. So, I really wanted a second external monitor to mimic my setup at work! I found this HP monitor and absolutely fell in love with it! It is VERY sleek and has a great picture! I LOVE the simple HDMI connection! My OLD monitor doesn't have HDMI connectivity! Also, my new HP fits perfectly on my desk! I plan to buy the HP - 27f when it goes on sale again! Hate I missed the last one!
This is the second HP 24f I have purchased.  I use multiple screens for work.  Perfect for my needs.  Clear picture quality.  Great size.  Really good value when purchased on sale.
Easy to set up, great quality and looks good, using as dual screen set up.
The display is very clear and crisp colors. A nice slender style.

one_review_title: Great clarity at an affordable price.
one_review_text: The delivery was quick. The Monitor was easy to install. The clarity was impressive. I plan to buy another one to have a pair
Great value and works great. Easy to set up and picture quality is great for the price

one_review_title: Attractive and easy to set up.
one_review_text: Attractive and easy to set up.  It’s slim, has a very thin bevel around it, has a good picture, and is easy to set up.  Good price (in the sale pricing I got).
Great affordable performance will quality product.

Nice screen perfect size! Clear pictures 
Great for price!
This monitor was very easy to install and use.  The display is crystal clear.
Clean, beautiful picture.  Easy to set up. Just plug in.

As many of us are now doing working from home and needed another screen for my old eyes. The resolution, price and weight, thinness of this screen are all excellent. Only thing that would be nice if you could raise or lower it. I recommended to 3 other people at work and we all are very happy so far.

I wasn't sure if this was the right monitor for me.  I needed it as an extension for my mac.  COVID-19 has me working remotely from home and I needed the extra monitor.

I am surprised that it's great.  It does take too much space on my desk.  Great sleek look.  Like the silvertone/black colors. 

Overall, very happy.  
Big Mahalo's Best Buy Hawaii
Needed to use this for a child's school from home.  Hooked it up to a Chromebook to provide a better display for all day at home learning.  Worked great, looks great, and got for a good price.

I bought this monitor during the pandemic and it's been a great help while working from home.  It was easy to set up.  The colors are bright and vibrant and the picture is clear.  I also bought a wireless keyboard/mouse combo and I plugged everything in, connected a couple wires and we were up and running in no time.  Highly recommend!
I purchased this monitor for my son who is doing virtual school. He has 2 monitors and its Amazing! Picture quality is great! Very easy to set up and its very thin and super elegant. My son loves it.
Super easy to set up!  HDMI connection. But best yet is the clarity of the image!
I upgraded to this monitor and I'm so glad I did!!  The clarity is pristine and the size of the screen is perfect!  This was money well spent!

For the price, this monitor is great! It's really easy to connect to your laptop and it's the perfect size. It's quite a large monitor but not too big that it takes up a lot of room. The height and slant is not really adjustable by a lot but you can slightly tilt it, if needed. Overall, for the value, this thing is great.

I am very pleased with this monitor, the picture quality is great, I like the fact you can mount the screen if you want.  The only con about this screen is the stand. The part of the stand that goes into the monitor feels flimsy, but I don't think it will break.

one_review_title: The larger screen makes my laptop easier to use.
one_review_text: My laptop has a 13" screen, so having the extra larger screen makes working a lot easier.  It is also great for watching presentations and being able to see the words.  Also having the second screen makes it easier to have more than one app open and being able to see both.  Overall, it was worth the price I spent on it.

I bought this monitor as a 2nd monitor for my PC..... I needed this for school purposes. ... it has a great resolution, colors, and sharpness....I bought it on sale for $99.00... I truly recommend it...it also looks very sleek.. Hopefully it lasts as others I have from HP.
Great value for money, took me maybe 5 minutes to set up. Excellent display quality

Bought this for work as a second monitor and has been great to use. One month later, still works as expected. Quality is very good. really appreciated the slim size of the screen and it doesn't take up much space on my desk with its base design. Was purchased during a sale and I think it was worth it.

I needed a new monitor, as my old one was dropped by one of the kids being clumsy... Did some looking around and found this for $99 bucks. I do basic PC tasks (internet, email, etc.) as well as gaming, though only casual, single player RPG and indie games.

The 1920x1080 resolution works fine, and the 75 Hz refresh rate is enough for me. The borderless edges are a nice touch, and setup was simple as well. The price point is what sold me, as I did not need or want to spend 300+ on a gaming monitor.

Quality product, hasn't failed on me yet, very happy with my purchase.
Love the picture quality and really like the simple base that is not a dust catcher.
Great monitor for the money. Easy installation and lightweight.
Fits all my needs. Beautiful screen with a great price.

These were on sale at a price I just couldn't pass up. Allowed me to go from a mix match dual monitor setup to having 2 beautiful matching monitors on my desk. I don't really game, so I can't speak to any potential there, but for work at home systems administration work, they've been quite nice.

one_review_title: Great monitor for the price - no speakers
one_review_text: Great monitor for the price. Sturdy design and a sharp clear screen with minimal bezel. Only complaint is the lack of internal speakers, but that seems to be the trend these days. Overall a great value.
Bought 2 because the price was so low and set up a dual monitor display. The setup is amazing! I highly recommend!

Easy to set up and has a small footprint so although it's bigger than my old monitor it fits nicely. The colors are beautiful with plenty of room to display multiple programs at the same time. Glad I invested in it.

The day I was looking at monitors, this happened to be on sale and I'll be honest, it was lowkey an impulse buy. Best impulse buy ever. Super easy to use and setup and makes working from home super easy. Great for normal use to watch videos too. The 23.8in is perfect for me (coming from using just a 13in laptop screen).  The only thing to note is that if you accidentally bump the desk, it does wobble a little but that's not a big deal since I'm pretty careful.

I had been working remotely for a few weeks, using the small screen of my surface device, and I couldn’t take it anymore. This Monitor is a decent size and fit on my home office desk perfectly. Set up was simple. The screen size and picture are great.

I needed to beef up my home workspace fast if I didn’t want to be stuck using a tiny laptop screen for as long as we’re in stay at home mode. This was the perfect solution. Very easy to set up and big enough to mostly make up for my dual monitor set up in the office. Good price too. Highly recommended.

I have been working from home for over a week and not sure when the quarantine would end so I knew I needed a 2nd screen because working from my laptop only is not efficient. This screen is definitely big enough and clear enough for what I need. I do finance and for my work to be easier I need to screens which I was I have in the office. I would definitely recommend this monitor. 
Also, it took like 2 minutes to hookup. 2 pieces connect in the back and it comes with an hdmi cable that I connected to my laptop.
Nice size, great style and super picture.  Also, easy to set-up.

Xlnt buy and sophisticated design.
High resolution and easy to set up and use.
This is a nice monitor at a good price.  It was easy to install, just plug it in and the computer figures it out.

Very pleased with this monitor for use on a laptop as a second display and as a primary monitor on a low end desktop. Excellent for web browsing, office work. Movies and video is good if not spectacular, blacks are not dark enough. OK for midrange gaming, wouldn't recommend for games needing high response. Great value for the money.

one_review_title: Great quality for the price point
one_review_text: I have been very pleased with this monitor, no complaints so far. It has been easy to use, quality visuals, and a great size for reviewing work documents. Have not tried it for gaming so not sure how the visuals would hold up there but overall a good product. The base is also small enough to fit on my elevated shelf on my desk, which is nice, I’ve had other stands that jetted out beyond the small elevated piece.

one_review_title: Great price, picture, form factor for transport
one_review_text: I got this to take to friends' homes when I'm working on their computers. It was on sale at a particularly nice price (~$120) just before school started, but its normal price (~$150, I believe) is still great for the quality. The picture is excellent, good resolution and quick response to motion, almost 24" with minimal framing, easy access to basic ports, thin, light weight, and the pedestal (which doesn't take up much space on the table) comes off and goes back on simply for ease of transport.
Got a new job working from home.  This was a good deal.  Set up and connection was easy.  Good graphics especially since I look at legal documents and spreadsheets.
Replacing an older monitor.  Picture is great.  Comes out of sleep quickly. Easy to setup.

I was looking for a HD monitor for my home office with anti-glare protection which would be within $200. This met all the criteria I had and the refresh rate was the best at the price point I was looking for. The only thing this doesn't have is the ability for the stand to adjust the height vertically. Other than that, it checked out all the requirements I had.
Excellent monitor for the money. Great screen quality and super easy to set up
I like the display and color this monitor give , for the price it has good color dept , the sleek design is great very light and compact

I was very impressed when purchasing my first monitor an HP 24f 23.8" IPS LED FHD FreeSync monitor. So, bought an identical second monitor

HP quality and Best Buy great price & available selection.
Very nice picture on this screen looks great and great looking monitor. Replaced a 15” so was a big upgrade
Lightweight, easy to use and set up, and looks great. Only complaint is that it shakes if you start typing fast. If you have a little bit of a shaky desk prepare to handle that. Great monitor though.
I bought multiple monitors for my kids for virtual learning (college and high school). Great value, great picture and easy set-up.
Easy setup and great picture. Looks good with my PC

Nice monitor. Good price.
Clear picture. Easy to install.
This monitor works great, easy setup and great picture.
Great monitor and easy to set up. The picture is crisp and clear. I love the look of this HP monitor. Looks great on my desk!!

Compared to my 24 inch Dell monitor which was brand new, this HP monitor has a much brighter screen and overall great screen quality. My only complaint is that it doesn't have the ability to raise up the screen so I have had to put a book under it to make it level with my other monitor for my current dual screen setup. Worth the hassle though for price, great buy!

Bought two monitors and they were very easy to set up on the new computer.  Picture is good and so much better than our old ones. They are a very nice size and easy to put together and hook up to the computer.
Beautiful picture sleek design for a good price. I recommend this monitor

It is good, but there are better choices.

The communication port is HDMI, but do not have audio, then when you connect to your Laptop via HMI you has to change setting in the Laptop if not you lose the Laptop Audio.

There are in the Market 24" Monitors at better price and with audio

Great monitor at a great price, needed to update do too much more work from home this was the second one we purchased because we love the first one so much. We use them for spreadsheets movie watching and gaming.

one_review_title: Love it.. great monitor for the price
one_review_text: Very simple, just plug it in and it works.  Screen quality is great.. Setup is just as simple as everyone says.   I've had it for about 1-2 months so far, no issues.
I was looking for a silver monitor to match the rest of my st up while doing virtual learning. This one looks great and is perfect when using NX software.
Using this as a second monitor and it's perfect for watching Netflix while I do whatever on my main screen. The FreeSync is a nice touch and would allow for it to be a decent main gaming monitor.
Pair with a HDMI to display port adapter and the screen resolution is flawless. Bought this on sale and for the price cannot beat it, I'm currently trying to buy another one but only on sale.
Open the box and plug in.  This was simple to install and I love the bright clear color.
Love this monitor crystal clear.  Has a tilt feature to cut down glare.  Easy to assemble.
Great computer for the price crisp picture and easy to use and set up

one_review_title: good screen at a good price
one_review_text: I bought this exact screen several months back,  to replace my main screen that had went bad.  So when my 2nd screen started acting up I waited for this to go on sale.  For 99 bucks its well worth the price.

This was on sale for $99! I am so happy with the screen quality. Colors, clarity, brightness, and contrast are great! The only thing I might have done differently, is to go up in size from 27" to 32". The 32" wasn't on sale, and the 27", honestly looks clearer at the same 1080p resolution. Highly recommended.

one_review_title: Nice choice for second laptop screen
one_review_text: Needed a second screen to use with laptop. Lightweight screen which makes it easy to move around. Decent resolution. Fine choice for the price point.

I bought one of these in order to facilitate my workflow. The image is very clear...and is very easy to use and very easy to configure the settings to your liking. A must have with the 4 year warranty plan that Best Buy offers to the customers. You will not go wrong with this one.
Monitors are clear and great for remote working, especially when your work requires dual monitors. Easy set up.
Sincerely like these monitors. Great slim profile, easy to set up and excellent image quality.  Perfect for setting up the dual monitor system  on my desk top.
So impressed with the quality of the screen. Very clear . Also easy set up.
Great quality and picture.  Easy to set up dual screens.

one_review_title: Great versatile monitor used with Macbooks and PC!
one_review_text: With the quarantine, I needed a monitor bigger than my laptop screen, and this one nailed it. Beautiful colors, easy set-up and responsiveness.  This is a great purchase!

one_review_title: Large stabile screen clear picture vivid colors
one_review_text:
As said in summary, The HP Clear sync monitor offers an exceptionally clearly defined display with vivid color and form.
Glad to have made the purchase!
Needed a quick but efficient monitor to get me though working from home during all of this. Easy set up and nice display for what I need.
Nice and bright visual option for your setup.  I purchased 2 and have a nice setup.
Needed to get a second screen for my in home setup. This worked out perfectly. Great monitor. Bright. Customizable settings. And looks great too.
True value for the price I’m pain. Crystal clear colors had an amazing price

Just bought a new pc and planned to use my old HP vga to cut costs; but when I saw this monitor on sale during the Black Friday specials I couldn’t resist! The colors are vibrant, crystal clear, and life like! Since I do a fair amount of photography and have a high resolution Nicon camera my pic’s now look fabulous! Slide shows appear like your there! The wide 27in screen makes viewing & editing MS Excel spreadsheet files easy and faster. Thought it might be too large to fit on my desk but already; Love it!
There are already many reviews taking about how amazing this monitor is. Well it really is! Amazing size and very clear images. It was also extremely easy to set up.

Good picture quality. The only downside is that  this monitor does not have mounting screw holes in the back, I initially bought two of these monitors so that I could mount them to an adjustable stand for dual monitors while I work but now I can’t. I like HP monitors but none of them have mounting screw holes so double check the specs if that is your intention.

one_review_title: Great way to bring your laptop home
one_review_text: Was very easy to connect our new laptop to this monitor and make it easy on our student's eyes.  Screen looks great.  Price was right.

Pro:
Not bad LED screen very compact and saves a lot of space at my work desk!
Con:  Built-in Speaker lacks.
Try to get this on sale overall a good buy for basic needs.
Purchased this monitor for our computer system. Screen display is very nice
Easy to set up and has good picture quality.  It has nice clean lines, too.

I bought one of these on sale and ended up buying another because the picture quality is great.  Easy to set up by myself.  Worked better than the more expensive Acer I tried.  Just wish it had VESA mount holes.
This is an excellent product by HP and delivers high quality colors. It can easily be connected to your Notebook as an extended display to ease your efforts while working.
This was a good choice to buy this monitor! The screen is wide and clear! I got this monitor to use with my HP lab top to do online college courses.
Easy to set up, easy to use and picture quality is very good too. Adjustments are pretty easy with this monitor. It does tilt if you need it tilted.
Couldn’t believe the deal I got on this monitor — $99!  It looks great, is very smooth, and works well with all of my products!

one_review_title: Love! Clear picture, crisp graphics, easy setup
one_review_text: Very happy with this purchase. Now that I am WFH. Needed something to help easy the strain on my eyes and has great graphics for presentations. This fits the bill

This is a great affordable monitor.  Easy to set up and anti glare is a great feature
I purchased this monitor to use with my HP Envoy laptop. It works great as a second monitor for design purposes. It is also great for watching movies and shows will I am working.
Love the edge to edge display and how thin this monitor is. Easy to use controls. Great for working from home. Great price at $99 4th July sale.
Nice Design. Borderless screen looks great. Has been good for gaming and office use. Looks good with HDMI and VGA port . Very low glare is nice also.
This is a very high quality monitor.  It has great resolution.  It is a real bonus that it was easy to set up and looks neat and clean.
This is an excellent monitor with beautiful resolution! Great price as well. Using as my second monitor and there are no lags or anything weird. Highly recommend!
Great monitor for the price. Clear and sun glare free.
Great monitor for beginners. Beautiful display. Large
Great monitor.  Easy to set up and a great picture.

My 9-year-old monitor finally gave up, so after some quick online price-shopping, I went Best Buy to purchase this one (knowing price-matching is a Best Buy promise—and I needed this monitor immediately). I couldn't be happier. Easy setup. No "daisy chain" of cords (like I previously used to make an old monitor work with a new Macbook Pro (also purchased at Best Buy). Great visibility for my design and proofing work. Not a gamer, so I can't comment on that.

Very pleased.
 Very sleek monitor, idea size for my space and easy set up & connection.
One great monitor for the price. Great color. Small footprint. Easy setup.
Like this HP monitor alot no issues as of yet..great screen quality and cable hookups.5 stars..
Not sure I'd feel as great about the value at full price, but on sale, this monitor is a great buy. Good size, clear and vivid picture; very satisfied with this purchase.
Great monitor.  Good quality visuals and sleek appearance.  Super easy to connect to my laptop.  Very pleased
Very clear screen.  Good colors.  The screen is large enough to work on two documents side-by-side.  Installation and set up were simple.
Nice monitor for support of Zoom calls.  Easy to set up.
I was expecting this monitor too be a little downgraded for the price but it is amazing and the display looks beautiful.

one_review_title: good monitor and happy with the purchase
one_review_text: good monitor for the price and very easy to set up. just a caution on connection stand, it is a plastic, need to be very careful if doing any hight or front and back screen adjustment. Other than that, I'm pleased with this monitor.
Good quality for a good price. Easy to setup and use.
Light weight, cost efficient, very spacious, the picture colors are phenomenal, the monitor is thin and an excellent choice for a work from home monitor.
Great picture quality and not much noticeable response so far. Right price got it from bestbuy. Missing VGA cable. HDMI cable included. 75hz refresh rate is great for crisp video response.
Easy to set up. Excellent price. Ok for some games.
Very cool and clear monito, holding strong, easy to install

one_review_title: Very good product, easy to use
one_review_text: The hp monitor was so nice . The size was perfect. The screen was clear and thin . I love it. I will recommend to anyone who is in need of course. Thanks to Best Buy for next day delivery. I will always shop at Best Buy.
Well worth the price. Images are clear and sharp. No problem with setup - just plug and play.
Had no issues during purchase, delivery, and hookup of product when received. Functioned as required and expected.

This is my first additional monitor for my at-home use. I cannot believe I went so long without having a second screen, primarily because it increased my productivity tremendously as well as eased my eye strain. This particular model took minutes to setup, and is extremely lightweight. My sale price was ~$100 and it was well worth the money spent!
I love it . It is perfect for the price and  easy to use clear and bright
Great price! Wonderful display. Perfect for work from home. Thank you.
Perfect for second screen at home office nice quality picture
Easy plug n play set up. Nice large screen. Great display. My wife said it makes her work much easier.
Bought this for grandson since his broke. Love the ease so connecting it and the display of it
Have two setup on Docking station for home office, slim and great profile on desk does not take over space, great image
great quality, a good price and looks great .. you will find it hard to beat this monitor
Easy install.   No power source through the monitor for old speakers.   Easily remedied with purchase of new speakers.

one_review_text: The Blink camera system was easy to setup, install and configure.
Needed a 2nd monitor for home office; easy set up and great picture quality. Very good value for the price.

crisp image, very easy to set up, good value.
Would recoomend
works great.great picture.use for home office. got it at a great price
Display view angle is good. Monitor is looking modern and beautiful. Planning to buy one more.

one_review_title: Quality monitor at a fair price
one_review_text: I purchased this monitor as a second screen during this WFH period.  It was easy to set up and connect to my laptop.  This addition has improved my efficiency and made WFH more bearable.

So easy to assemble-- just pop the stand on it, twist the screw with the provided hook and you're ready to plug it in and turn it on.  Great color.  Responds extremely quickly upon wake-up. It's also a great looking monitor.
Clean lines, small border/ frame, excellent picture. I use this for work and it has been a great screen. Clean crisp picture, no lag in changes from page to page
Great monitor for your PC, easy to see and use. Great value for the money.

Purchased 12/08/2019 on sale for $99 as a second monitor.  Not used for gaming but has a great picture when streaming HD vids.  Easy install.  Only has HDMI and VGA (one each) connections.  Stand feels a bit cheap but functions without a problem.  I will probably purchase another one to be a third monitor for my set up.
So far fantastic. I would recommend it because it's so easy to use it and for the price, beautiful.
Great monitor with crisp colors.  No issues and got this on sale for a great price!
Great monitor. Huge screen and very crisp colors. Bought it for my mom. Her vision is not that great, so I decided to replace her old 18" LG monitor with this one, and she is very happy with it.
THE PRICE WAS JUST RIGHT, SO FAR ITS BEEN A GREAT EXPIRENCE WITH THIS MONITOR

Easy set up.  Wish it had a HDMI cable. Nice crisp screen.  I use this for working at home and is 100 times better then my one I have at work.  Very happy and I got it on sale for under 100.00.  It was a win win.

Got this screen on time when the “stay home” mandate started so that I can work from home. It was easy to install and connect. I took one point off because of the cable clutter I have on the desk. I ended up buying a 12inch HDMI to connect it with my laptop. I wish it would come with a Bluetooth.
Monitor is perfect for my needs. It was easy to hook up and configure. Crystal clear.
Beautiful color, easy to adjust, just plug it in and go!
This was just the right size with a decent enough picture and a steal as far as the price.

one_review_title: Monster Price for a Monster Monitor
one_review_text:

The screen supports a wide range of colors so anything you're looking at is bound to be eye-popping. Also, 75Hz is waaaaay more noticible than you'd think- it knocks out any other standard 60Hz screen anyday. 

For the price and the elegance this monitor provides, it is a MONSTER steal!
Perfect for the office, I saw these monitors on sale so I purchased two for my work set up, great value and picture quality.
This monitor is awesome, the clarity of the screen and the ease of putting it together was great.

one_review_title: Nice monitor at a good price.

one_review_title: The colors of the screen is excellent very clear.

Some reviews said it did not work well with a Mac, which I thought was strange as never had a problem in the past. So I ordered it for pickup and it has worked well. Nice looking as well. For the USP=C to HDMI adaptor, I also purchased the j5create - 6' USB Type C-to-HDMI Cable. This is really nice as it's one sleek cable without a clunky adaptor. Just plugged it in and it worked, synced the correct resolution and color balance was fine. The monitor has lots of settings but I didn't need to fool with anything. And BTW, only the first USB-C port on the MacBook seems to drive a monitor. The second one works for power and data transfer.

It was love at first sight, and after sitting in front of them for 10 hours a day for the past few weeks, I'm very happy with my purchase. So here are the pros - size and 4K resolution are standouts; the detail, color quality, brightness, are wonderful. Since I spend most of my time staring at text (documents, code, email, slack) the eyestrain reduction has been very welcome (see images - the slight tint in color is because of this). I was fortunate to be able to get two of them to setup an office environment at home, and at this time I'd say they are almost perfect. 

So the only thing I can say is that the controls (its a direction switch at the base of the screen below the Samsung logo) can be a bit finicky when you are just starting to use it. Things like turning them off can be a bit tricky if you have no inputs, as the monitors auto detect sources and can present options based on that. But once you figure that out, its simple to use. That really the only thing I've found and that me nitpicking.
One important lesson I've learned thought is not so much about the monitor, but about using 4K, especially multiple 4K monitors on an older laptop: You need an appropriate 4K Dock to push 4K content to all devices without issue. I have two laptops - one for work (a 2019 Dell Precision 7730 with Xeon processor) and my personal (a 2015 HP Omen 17t-W200 with Core i7 and and UHD screen) that I've connect the monitors to and while the newer Dell can push 4K to both monitors without any issue, my HP started stuttering and lagging just connecting one. After some checks, I found that the integrated graphics cards needed to be configured to use my NVIDIA card as primary or offload some of the processing to the Dock. I purchased the WAVLINK USB-C Dual 4K universal docking station (Model UG69PD2) with E-mark chip and it supported all three screens at 4K@ 60Hz from both devices without issues. It also supports Mac and has a built in 100W power to the laptop and devices (if your device supports it). If you are having issues with refresh of you purchase this monitor, I highly getting a dock. It'll provide a lot of flexibility and expandability for you.Read more

one_review_title: It’s perfect. Except the design of wall mount.
one_review_text:
Everything is just more than I expected. And I think it’s anti glare too even there’s a No in specifications. 
Just one more thing: if you want to use the Monitor Desk Mount make sure that you are buying the absolute Vesa Wall Mount “75mmx75mm”. DO NOT BUY the 100mmx100/75mmx75mm. It wil not fit the circle in the back of the monitor.

Spending $700 on 2 monitors was not the plan but after purchasing and returning cheap Lenovo monitors... I knew that this is not an area where I should compromise especially when I spend 7 hours a day staring at them for work. I have them set up on the Mount It! dual monitor stand and I see a lot of concerns about the vesa hardware issue. Honestly I just screwed them in as far as they would go without bending the mount or damaging the monitors and they are secured on even with a little gap. So the standard 75mm/100mm hardware worked for me. I added pictures.

I've been using the monitor for a couple of months now and it's beautiful.  I use it for school and work and it's stunning.  I'm happy that I know enough about computers to have sound play from my connected laptop because the monitor doesn't have speakers. When I first connected this monitor to my laptop, the default setting was to have sound played from the monitor so I had to change that, of course. 

The stand is sturdy. The monitor's bezels are nice and narrow and I love how the control buttons are under the screen, yet still easily accessible. It has 2 HDMI ports and 1 DisplayPort.

A mayor change from my old Dell 2008 24" monitor! The high resolution let me to have side-to-side aplicacions very comfortable to use. Colors are accurate, very good contrast, and black almost black.
The cons:
HDMI input may interfere if you use some direct-connect device, like my amazon firestick TV (I have to buy an adapter to fit it). 
Other cons, comparing to other monitors, it's the lack of USB inputs.
And the sound is almost inexistent. This point do not bother me, as my laptop have very nice sound and I also use headphones. DO NOT BUY IF YOU ARE LOOKING FOR SPEAKER REPLACEMENT!
Just purchase this but the picture seems to be excellent for viewing our camera system

I purchased this monitor as an upgrade to an older, smaller monitor to improve a home office experience and it does not disappoint! The large clear screen works perfectly for reading text and large spread sheets and when used with Windows 10 the “snap” feature is as good as using a two monitor set up. 

Having two HDMI inputs is extremely versatile. I use one as a dedicated input for my HP ENVY laptop, and the other as variable Input between a Nintendo Switch Dock, Microsoft Surface, and XBox One S console - and they all work perfectly on this monitor. A nice bonus feature is eye saver mode which ups the sepia tones to reduce eye fatigue - this is great if you’ve ever spent 8+ hours in Microsoft Excel! 

The Xbox One S autodetected the use of 4K And HDR and I was pleasantly surprised with the color range and default settings right out of the box. I didn’t even change them for gaming! 
The monitor itself is very attractive and the semi bezel-less design is really striking when the monitor is on. Really makes the monitor look huge when displaying content. 

The lack of built in speakers is maybe the only downside for me, but with HDMI pass through and a dedicated 3.5mm audio jack on the back of the monitor you can set up one set of speakers with no hassle and have it apply to all inputs which is a great feature. I use this monitor with a set of desktop Logitech MX speakers and it works perfectly with no loss of audio quality that I can detect. 

Overall this is a great purchase and I would recommend this monitor to anyone looking for a large, bright and clear image for work or play alike.Read more

This is one of the better monitors that I have tried out. The colors are so vibrant and the picture quality is excellent.  I use this monitor for my Xbox One X and it's simply just beautiful. It has free sync, HDR10, 4k UHD with 60 hz . You can't go wrong with this monitor.

Purchased a monitor solely for the purpose of needing more screen space to work/study from home during the whole quarantine thing. Went back and forth between this and the LG ultra wide 34”. Ended up deciding on this because price was similar and would like to use the monitor for gaming purposes as well. Super easy to assemble and quality is superb. I have it connected to my MacBook Pro 13” w/ Touch Bar that was released in mid-2017. Using a usb-c to HDMI cord I purchased from amazon. Only downside is no speakers on the monitor, so connecting via the usb-c to HDMI cord actually disabled the volume on your MacBook Pro.

one_review_title: Xbox One X Gaming and Future Xbox Series X Gaming
one_review_text: I had the monitor for a month now and it's truly awesome how great the picture is and how the colors pop. 4k UHD, VRR with Free Sync, HDR, and 60Hz is prefect for the Xbox One X and even for the future Xbox Series X because honestly you don't need HDMI 2.1 because the vast majority of games are going to be limited to 4k 60Hz for most Triple A and first party games. There are going to be some games that can output 4k 120Hz but they are not going to be that graphically demanding so it can reach those frames per second more like possibly Racing games and Platformers I believe, so in the end running it at 4k 60Hz would probably output a cleaner and better picture because they can fit more pixels in per bit without sacrificing for better frames. HDMI 2.1 is still fairly new technology so perhaps maybe the Xbox Series X2 or upgraded model that comes out will have a better GPU and CPU for true 4k 120Hz gaming possibly something like the new Nivida GTX 3080 or 3090 cards in terms of technology but those cards cost alone over $700. Hopefully that answered any questions you might have, let me know if anything :)

one_review_title: Great budget 4k monitor with good HDR
one_review_text: I bought this monitor as my first 4k monitor. I bought it for the price and the HDR. The monitor has Samsung gaming mode which is pretty much just a color profile that seems to try and mimic HDR in non HDR compatible games or movies. I mostly use the monitor for gaming and despite the 60hz, 4k games look amazing. The color profile does a very good job mimicking an HDR-like appearance. I don't have a video card capable of outputting most games above 60 fps in 4k at max fidelity... So the 60hz doesn't bother me. This monitor is great and the colors are nice and vibrant. I just wish the blacks were darker and the contrast was improved. HDR gaming is also very good for the price. Im very impressed with this monitor, considering the price.

At this point, I've only had the monitor for a few weeks.  I primarily using this monitor for work, so a lot of text, number and things of that nature.  Colors look look, text is crisp, good viewing angles and overall satisfied.  

I do play PC games every once in a while.  It's good but not great and can't compare to some high end monitors but for me it works.  Driving it with displayport and it is FreeSync capable which helps with tearing and such.  It doesn't enable FreeSync automatically - you do have to go through the monitor menu and enable it.

Only downside is I'm not really a fan of the mini-joystick control for setting the monitor options, turning on / off and everything else.  All lot of manufacturers are starting to use them but I don't find it intuitive and I'm always leery of having a single point of failure.  That is - if that joystick starts acting up - then I'll loose access to every monitor control.

This is a very nice 4k Monitor! 28" is a great size and adds a lot of real estate. I have a GTX1080 and It allows me to still game at Ultra on almost all of my games DOOM ETERNAL looks SO GOOD!!!!
When turning on HDR I have to lower the settings a little bit (due to my older graphics card) but MY LORD does it look nice! 

Highly recommend this!

Only three (SMALL) things I don't like:
1: The stand, Its a great shape but you cant adjust the height or swivel.(Ended up buying a Vesa mount ARM)
2. Depending on the Vesa mount you might have to adjust the bracket to fit the curve of the monitor.
3. They Include only a PREMIUM HDMI made for 4k, But it wasn't holding up to my tasks (screen tearing). I bought a 8K Display Port and all my issues were resolved.

I'm very happy with this monitor, it is crisp and clear.  The colors are sharp and it paired well with my MacBook Pro.

My only note is the sales person said it was the exact same unit as a higher resolution 27" Samsung.  It is not, wish the sales person knew their merchandise better.  However, that said, I'm very happy with the unit.

In the office, I have 2, 4k monitors, but, at home, I had a single HD monitor.  I bought this to bring the home office up to snuff now that I am spending all my time at home.  I am very happy with the monitor and the laptop sitting next to it (old HD monitor is being used elsewhere now).  This monitor gives me the real estate to have a number of windows open, it is very sharp, and there is some sort of "eye saver" mode that makes staring at it for 8 hours more comfortable.  I haven't tried the picture-in-picture stuff yet, but it should come in handy.

Well worth the price. I needed a new gaming monitor and wanted something that would support my ps4 and soon to be mine PS5. This bad boy has hdr 4K resolution decent refresh rates and a perfect size for a gaming desk. There are some nice features and gaming mode looks great. I also do some lite pc gaming and it performs far beyond what I need to play some league of legends. I recommend unless you are looking For a demo quality monitor. This satisfied all of my needs

Ive had this monitor for about 2 months now. The display is great! Colors are great very vivid and the HDR and FreeSync are great features.(FreeSync specifically if you have an AMD GPU). Only reason I wont give 5 stars is that it did not come with any mounting screws and does not seem to be able to be mounted which for me isnt a big deal with my current setup but definitely something to be aware of. Overall great product can never go wrong with Samsung!

I have a universal monitor mount that has holes for 75x75 and 100x100. This monitor has 75x75 holes but the back of the monitor has a big plastic ring above the screw holes such that a universal mount won’t fit. Kind of a weird design. Search these reviews and you’ll see other people had the same issue - but they used a dremel to trim the plastic. I wasn’t about to do that so I got a monitor with better mounting ability.
It's really sharp and wide. I play a 4k video and it show beautifully. But it display more orange than i thought.

Great for gaming. The low latency is good for the fps games and the colors pop for those casual games. Pair this with a Xbox one X/ PS4 Pro and you'll see a really good difference in quality. My only complaint is that the tilting is stiff i thought it was going to break when I adjusted it.

one_review_title: Great monitor for working at home
one_review_text: This monitor is clear and crisp, currently using as a second screen to my Windows 10 laptop in my work-from-home office. This monitor has been a true God-send as I have utilized dual monitors for well over 10 years. The size and clarity of this monitor is like having the real estate of two monitors in one!

I got this because of the size but samsung is known for their beautiful colors so the 4k is a nice addition. It is very bright due to the LED ips, I was tempted to get a gaming monitor but I knew I was going to use it for more then just gaming so this is a far better choice and for a great price as well.

This monitor is awesome! I use dual monitors for my home office and it is very easy to see your work documents.  I guess you could use it for gaming, but that's not my thing. 
 The only thing I don't like is the power button, but I guess you can always leave it on.

Surprised my husband with this after he broke his tv on accident and he absolutely loves it. Says all the games play better on this it’s a must buy ! Only thing I’m not a fan of is there’s no sound for when we switch over to tv but he has a headset so no problem :)

Excellent screen, the size and the 4K resolution is a perfect combination for a regular desk where I'm about 12-18 inches away from the screen. High resolution allows for multiple windows to open simultaneously in the four corners of the screen for multitasking.

one_review_title: Short on Inputs but a Great Monitor
one_review_text: No on board speakers and limited IO but otherwise a great monitor for the price. I use it for PS4 games in HDR and it's quite good. Not a huge fan of the single button menu controls or the limited input selection but it's got a great picture and finish, well worth it.

one_review_title: The monitor I've been waiting for!!!
one_review_text: As the owner of a 4K UHD TV for the past three years, I've been spoiled by how amazing Full HD Blu-rays look on it; the visuals/colors just really pops when watching. It got to a point where I was no longer satisfied with a Full HD monitor for the PC. I don't have the shelf space for anything bigger than 28" so a TV wasn't going to work. The initial 4K monitors that were coming out started pricing close to the four figure range so that wasn't going to work, either. Eventually I stumbled onto this monitor: majority positive reviews, priced fairly decent, perfect screen size. Setup was relatively easy: installing monitor to base, connecting terminals to outputs, adjusting settings took about 30 min. Colors are rather accurate out the box but, for those of you who're insistent to tinkering, the color setting is disabled when set to Cinema mode; you can use the Custom setting instead if you want to play around with color & gamma. Catching up on the last few seasons of Hawaii Five-O & also watching Picard on CBS all-access and the colors are vibrant: lush greens, eye-popping reds, etc. Same goes for watching Batman (the 60's tv series) on remastered 1080p Blu-Ray via PS3 connected to an HDMI receiver. And blacks are just that, black, not a dark gray; they're often times rich & deep (almost OLED black). Don't let the screen size fool you- there's plenty of amazing detail on display here: I can make out all sorts of freckles, pores, liver spots, wrinkles, etc. Particularly watching Batman the 60's series, I can see the delineation of blacks in the suits that are being worn (lapels, designs, fabric, etc.); I can even make out the seams in the Dynamic Duo's tights where they begin & end (wasn't seeking it out; just hard not to miss, lol). Can't speak on the HDR aspect nor FreeSync since the graphics card in my PC doesn't support it (not really an issue for me since I use my big-screen TV for those matters). Toggled around with the PIP function (don't have a need for it, personally); the different screen sizes seem more than adequate.  My only real quibble is the lack of individual memory presets for EACH terminal: having to constantly adjust picture settings when switching between the 2 HDMI inputs can be a bit annoying. Oh well; I'd still highly recommend this monitor to any/everyone who's interested.Read more

Excellent choice, true 4K, I connect my MacBook Pro with the DisplayPort cable and also I connect the Lorex 4K surveillance system with HDMI cable, the PIP from the monitor allow me to split the system and view them together all in one place.

I bought this monitor to use as a second screen since I am working from home for the foreseeable future.  It was very easy to set up and I immediately started using it extensively, which has been a huge help for many of my tasks.  Highly recommend!

Purchased 2 of these monitors for working from home. Originally purchased 2 32” 1080p curved monitors and returned them for these true 4K monitors and there is no comparison. If you need a lot of screen space I highly recommend

Good monitor to watch Netflix or browse sites. When gaming on PS4, the Game Mode would only be available to turn on for certain games. I don't know why that is. Also, for darker games, this monitor does not get bright enough for certain maps.

My first unit had light bleed along one side and dead pixels throughout the display. I almost kept it with the mindset that it is probably the best that I would get and was hardly noticeable on anything else than a a black screen. 

I eventually returned the unit and received the second one about a week later (during pandemic) and it does not have any noticable issues.
